fields.lore: The benevolent touch of Io brings strength from between the planes.
fields.description: Tether yourself to an allied hero, granting both of you bonus movement speed. When you restore health or mana, your target gains 1.5x the amount. Any enemy unit that crosses the tether is slowed. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether.
fields.name: Tether
fields.notes: If you try to tether a unit that is 700 distance or further away from Io, he will latch on and pull himself closer to the tethered unit (to a distance of 300). The tethered unit will heal 50% faster.

fields.lore: Io twists the particles of the universe with his unimaginable capabilities.
fields.description: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io, damaging all that they hit around you. If a particle hits an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirits, but don't cause them to explode.  After the duration, the Spirits will explode.
fields.name: Spirits
fields.notes: Min/Max Range: 100/875.

fields.lore: Io twists the particles of the universe with his unimaginable capabilities.
fields.description: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io, damaging all that they hit around you. If a particle hits an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirits, but don't cause them to explode.  After the duration, the Spirits will explode.
fields.name: Spirits
fields.notes: Min/Max Range: 100/875.

fields.lore: Drawing on the energy of matter from all worlds, Io begins the unravelling of time.
fields.description: Io gains bonus attack speed and damage reduction, at the cost of draining HP and mana per second.  If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.
fields.name: Overcharge
fields.notes: Io's tethered unit will also benefit from the attack speed and reduction, but only Io pays the drain in HP and mana.

fields.lore: Io twists the particles of the universe with his unimaginable capabilities.
fields.description: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io, damaging all that they hit around you. If a particle hits an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirits, but don't cause them to explode.  After the duration, the Spirits will explode.
fields.name: Spirits
fields.notes: Min/Max Range: 100/875.

fields.lore: Io is the embodiment of the mystery of the universe.
fields.description: Teleport yourself and any tethered ally to any location on the map. After the spell expires you and any tethered ally will return to where you teleported from.
fields.name: Relocate
fields.notes: Enemies receive a visual indicator on the minimap of the target location during the cast delay. If Io is disabled during the cast delay, Relocate is cancelled. If an allied hero is Tethered, that hero will teleported along with you. You can break the tether at any time to prevent that hero from teleporting with you.

fields.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
fields.description: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
fields.name: Illusory Orb
fields.notes: The Illusory Orb grants flying vision around its location while it travels. Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

fields.lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
fields.description: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
fields.name: Phase Shift
fields.notes: Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift. Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift. Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.

fields.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
fields.description: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
fields.name: Illusory Orb
fields.notes: The Illusory Orb grants flying vision around its location while it travels. Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

fields.lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.
fields.description: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
fields.name: Waning Rift

fields.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
fields.description: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
fields.name: Illusory Orb
fields.notes: The Illusory Orb grants flying vision around its location while it travels. Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

fields.lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
fields.description:
Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for .5 seconds and damaging them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, deals damage again and stuns.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Dream Coil

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
fields.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
fields.name: Crystal Nova

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite

fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts 7 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Freezing Field
fields.notes: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts 1 second). Every 0.1 second an explosion occurs, for a total of 70 explosions.

fields.description: Allows manipulation of fire elements and grants a permanent intelligence bonus. Each Exort instance provides increased attack damage.
fields.name: Exort
fields.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

fields.lore: So begins a new age of knowledge.
fields.description:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated, creating a new spell at the Invoker's disposal. Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Invoke
fields.notes: The arrangement of instances does not matter.

fields.lore: Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.
fields.description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
fields.name: Chaos Bolt

fields.lore: Armageddon rides between the planes, bringing Chaos Knight to his victim wherever he may hide.
fields.description: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a random point along the line between the two of you. Gives you bonus attack damage for one attack.
fields.name: Reality Rift
fields.notes: Chaos Knight and the target unit are made to face each other, and Chaos Knight and his illusions are issued an attack order against the target.

fields.lore: Drawing on his battles fought across many worlds and many times, phantasms of the Chaos Knight rise up to quell all who oppose him.
fields.description: Summons several copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The illusions deal full damage, but take double damage.
fields.name: Phantasm
fields.notes: Removes most negative buffs from Chaos Knight. Chaos Knight is invulnerable for 0.5 seconds when casting, allowing him to dodge stuns and damage.

fields.lore: Chaos Knight's unwieldy power bludgeons those who stand before him, crushing the thickest of armors.
fields.description: Chaos Knight's mojo gives him a chance to deal bonus damage.
fields.name: Chaos Strike

fields.lore: Sometimes breaking one of the Riftshadow Crystals can be just the trick for getting yourself out of a bind.  Or your other self.
fields.description: Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1.5 seconds, dealing damage in both the departure and arrival locations.
fields.name: Poof
fields.notes: Can be cast through the minimap. Can teleport to Meepo illusions.

fields.lore: Catching dinner in the Riftshadow Ruins can be quite the task.
fields.description: Tosses a net at the target point, pinning down all enemy units.  Earthbind prevents invisibility, blink, and interrupts channeling.
fields.name: Earthbind
fields.notes: While preventing units from going invisible, Earthbind won't hit units that are already invisible. Does not work on magic immune units or Roshan.

fields.lore: Do I know you?
fields.description:
Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears.  If any of the clones die, they all die. Increases the speed at which you respawn. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Divided We Stand
fields.notes: Clones can't use Arcane Boots or pick up runes.

fields.lore: Sometimes breaking one of the Riftshadow Crystals can be just the trick for getting yourself out of a bind.  Or your other self.

fields.name: Poof
fields.notes: Can be cast through the minimap. Can teleport to Meepo illusions.

fields.lore: Keeping your pack light and having few but versatile tools is the best bet for survival.
fields.description: Meepo enchants his weapon to deal damage per second, as well as slow the movement speed of the attacked unit.  Geostrikes from multiple Meepos stack.
fields.name: Geostrike
fields.notes: Slows magic immune units.

fields.lore: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.
fields.description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
fields.name: Light Strike Array
fields.notes: Light Strike Array will destroy trees in its area of effect.

fields.lore: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.
fields.description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 9 seconds.
fields.name: Fiery Soul
fields.notes: Duration refreshes each time a new spell is cast. Using items does not trigger Fiery Soul.

fields.lore: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.
fields.description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
fields.name: Dragon Slave
fields.notes: Dragon Slave can hit units up to 1225 units away.

fields.lore: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.

fields.lore: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.
fields.description:
Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Laguna Blade
fields.notes: Laguna Blade has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.

fields.lore: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.
fields.description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
fields.name: Dragon Slave
fields.notes: Dragon Slave can hit units up to 1225 units away.

fields.lore: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.
fields.description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
fields.name: Light Strike Array
fields.notes: Light Strike Array will destroy trees in its area of effect.

fields.lore: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.
fields.description:
Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Laguna Blade
fields.notes: Laguna Blade has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.

fields.lore: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.
fields.description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 9 seconds.
fields.name: Fiery Soul
fields.notes: Duration refreshes each time a new spell is cast. Using items does not trigger Fiery Soul.

fields.lore: Lucifer's appetite and greed are never sated.
fields.description: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed.
fields.name: Devour
fields.notes: Gives Doom the original bounty of the creep, along with the bonus gold. The amount of time it takes to Devour depends on the current HP of the unit. Doom can't Devour mechanical or ancient units. If you devour a creep without abilities, you'll keep the abilities you had previously.

fields.lore: The Fallen One spreads destruction in his wake, sparing none from the flame which sustains him.
fields.description: Carpets the nearby earth in flames, damaging enemies while Doom gains bonus HP regen and increased movement speed.
fields.name: Scorched Earth
fields.notes: Scorched Earth follows Doom, centered on his location. Other units Doom controls also benefit from Scorched Earth.

fields.lore: The Fallen One spreads destruction in his wake, sparing none from the flame which sustains him.

fields.lore: When a name is tolled from the bell of Vashundol, doom is sure to follow.
fields.description:
Inflicts a curse that prevents an enemy Hero from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.  Doom also disables most passive abilities and removes positive buffs on cast. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Doom
fields.notes: Doom damages units through magic immunity. Units afflicted by Doom can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.

fields.lore: Lucifer shares the fire branding bestowed upon him at the time of his exile.
fields.description: Dissipates a piece of an enemy Hero's soul, mini-stunning and dealing bonus damage equal to 20% of the target's maximum health when the enemy's level is a multiple of a specific number or 25.
fields.name: LVL? Death
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling abilities.

fields.lore: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.
fields.description: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot. The arrow deals damage to enemy units and destroys trees in its path. Damage is greatest on first target, and reduces by 10% for each target it pierces thereafter.  If the channeling is cancelled early, the shot will still occur but deal less damage.
fields.name: Powershot
fields.notes: The arrow initially moves at 3000 units per second, but slowed a little each time it hits an enemy or tree. Powershot will destroy trees in its area of effect.

fields.lore: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.
fields.description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.
fields.name: Windrun
fields.notes: The slow will affect enemies with magic immunity. Windrun will not evade projectiles that were created before it was activated.

fields.lore: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.
fields.description: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot. The arrow deals damage to enemy units and destroys trees in its path. Damage is greatest on first target, and reduces by 10% for each target it pierces thereafter.  If the channeling is cancelled early, the shot will still occur but deal less damage.
fields.name: Powershot
fields.notes: The arrow initially moves at 3000 units per second, but slowed a little each time it hits an enemy or tree. Powershot will destroy trees in its area of effect.

fields.lore: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.
fields.description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.75.
fields.name: Shackleshot
fields.notes: This spell can shackle two enemies together, stunning them both. Can shackle the target to an enemy unit or tree at most 525/500 behind it. Shackleshot cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.
fields.description:
Windranger channels the wind, gaining maximum attack speed on the enemy unit or structure, although with reduced damage, including damage from Unique Attack Modifiers and item effects.  Lasts 20 seconds.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Focus Fire
fields.notes: Can target buildings and magic immune units.

fields.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
fields.description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.
fields.name: Counter Helix
fields.notes: Counter Helix checks for triggering whenever an attack against Axe begins, not when Axe is actually damaged by said attack.

fields.lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.
fields.description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
fields.name: Berserker's Call
fields.notes: Affects units with magic immunity.

fields.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
fields.description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.
fields.name: Counter Helix
fields.notes: Counter Helix checks for triggering whenever an attack against Axe begins, not when Axe is actually damaged by said attack.

fields.lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
fields.description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.
fields.name: Battle Hunger
fields.notes: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff. Units affected by Battle Hunger cannot be denied.

fields.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
fields.description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.
fields.name: Counter Helix
fields.notes: Counter Helix checks for triggering whenever an attack against Axe begins, not when Axe is actually damaged by said attack.

fields.lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.
fields.description:
Axe spots weakness and strikes, dealing moderate damage but instantly killing an enemy unit with low health.  When an enemy hero is killed in this way, the cooldown is reset. Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Culling Blade
fields.notes: The killing blow goes through magic immunity.

fields.lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
fields.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.
fields.name: Storm Hammer

fields.lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
fields.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.
fields.name: Storm Hammer

fields.lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
fields.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.
fields.name: Storm Hammer

fields.lore: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.
fields.description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 25 seconds.
fields.name: God's Strength
fields.notes: The bonus damage is based on base damage and the primary attribute of Sven.

fields.lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
fields.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.
fields.name: Storm Hammer

fields.lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.
fields.description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
fields.name: Great Cleave
fields.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. The cleave damages a circular area in front of Sven.

fields.lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!
fields.description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 7 seconds.
fields.name: Warcry
fields.notes: Fully stacks with other armor and speed granting abilities.

fields.lore: Kaldr's presence draws those around him into a frozen void, threatening to lock them in an icy prison for eternity.
fields.description: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.
fields.name: Cold Feet
fields.notes: Total possible damage: 150/200/250/300. Deals damage every 0.8 seconds.

fields.lore: The Ancient Apparition's eternal knowledge brings a frigid enchantment to his allies.
fields.description: A frigid gust enchants allied heroes, granting them bonus magical damage for a given number of physical attacks, while slowing their attack speed slightly.  Ancient Apparition always receives the buff. Lasts 30 seconds.
fields.name: Chilling Touch
fields.notes: Extra damage is its own instance of damage. Only works against heroes and creeps.

fields.lore: The Ancient Apparition's eternal knowledge brings a frigid enchantment to his allies.
fields.description: A frigid gust enchants allied heroes, granting them bonus magical damage for a given number of physical attacks, while slowing their attack speed slightly.  Ancient Apparition always receives the buff. Lasts 30 seconds.
fields.name: Chilling Touch
fields.notes: Extra damage is its own instance of damage. Only works against heroes and creeps.

fields.lore: Frozen, caustic winds are at the whim of Kaldr, chilling the field of battle.
fields.description: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows movement speed and increases magic damage done in its range.  Lasts 16 seconds.
fields.name: Ice Vortex
fields.notes: Doesn't affect magic immune units.

fields.lore: The Ancient Apparition's eternal knowledge brings a frigid enchantment to his allies.
fields.description: A frigid gust enchants allied heroes, granting them bonus magical damage for a given number of physical attacks, while slowing their attack speed slightly.  Ancient Apparition always receives the buff. Lasts 30 seconds.
fields.name: Chilling Touch
fields.notes: Extra damage is its own instance of damage. Only works against heroes and creeps.

fields.lore: Ice storms from ages past flow through Kaldr's frosty limbs, crashing into the world and turning its inhabitants into monuments to his eternal power.
fields.description:
An explosive ball of icy hail that can be used to strike targets anywhere on the map. On first use, Kaldr launches a tracer towards the targeted location.  The second use marks the current location of the blast, upon which the actual projectile is launched - the greater the distance, the larger the radius affected. It deals damage to enemy units and applies a frostbite curse to units in and around the area that prevents regeneration or healing. Frostbitten units will take minor damage over time; if the units drop below a certain percentage of hitpoints, they'll instantly shatter.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Ice Blast
fields.notes: The area of effect is 275 + 50*TimeTraveled, capped at 1000.  The freeze area along the path is 275. Kill will be granted to the source of the damage that triggers the shatter. The instant kill doesn't work on illusions or Meepo clones. The HP Freeze prevents most kinds of healing, including the fountain. The frozen debuff can be purged.

fields.name: Chilling Touch
fields.notes: Extra damage is its own instance of damage. Only works against heroes and creeps.

fields.notes: Total possible damage: 150/200/250/300. Deals damage every 0.8 seconds.

fields.name: Cold Feet
fields.notes: Total possible damage: 150/200/250/300. Deals damage every 0.8 seconds.

fields.lore: Kaldr's presence draws those around him into a frozen void, threatening to lock them in an icy prison for eternity.
fields.description: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.
fields.name: Cold Feet
fields.notes: Total possible damage: 150/200/250/300. Deals damage every 0.8 seconds.

fields.lore: Ice storms from ages past flow through Kaldr's frosty limbs, crashing into the world and turning its inhabitants into monuments to his eternal power.
fields.description:
An explosive ball of icy hail that can be used to strike targets anywhere on the map. On first use, Kaldr launches a tracer towards the targeted location.  The second use marks the current location of the blast, upon which the actual projectile is launched - the greater the distance, the larger the radius affected. It deals damage to enemy units and applies a frostbite curse to units in and around the area that prevents regeneration or healing. Frostbitten units will take minor damage over time; if the units drop below a certain percentage of hitpoints, they'll instantly shatter.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Ice Blast
fields.notes: The area of effect is 275 + 50*TimeTraveled, capped at 1000.  The freeze area along the path is 275. Kill will be granted to the source of the damage that triggers the shatter. The instant kill doesn't work on illusions or Meepo clones. The HP Freeze prevents most kinds of healing, including the fountain. The frozen debuff can be purged.

fields.lore: Frozen, caustic winds are at the whim of Kaldr, chilling the field of battle.
fields.description: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows movement speed and increases magic damage done in its range.  Lasts 16 seconds.
fields.name: Ice Vortex
fields.notes: Doesn't affect magic immune units.

fields.lore: Though no stranger to travelling the cosmic void, soaring within an atmosphere offers unique pleasures.
fields.description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units he comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to his original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.
fields.name: Icarus Dive
fields.notes: Icarus Dive has a 2 second travel duration, and can be cancelled by casting the ability again while in flight.

fields.lore: The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.
fields.description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around you. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
fields.name: Fire Spirits

fields.lore: The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.
fields.description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around you. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
fields.name: Fire Spirits

fields.lore: The solar crucible of a Supernova may be fatal, yet from its flames arise new beacons to wander infinity.
fields.description: The Phoenix willingly ends his current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area.
fields.name: Supernova

fields.lore: The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.

fields.lore: The vent through which such stellar energy flows is mere atoms wide.
fields.description: Drawing from his own inner fire, Phoenix expels a huge beam of light at the cost of his own life energy. The beam damages enemies for a percentage of their life and heals allies for half the amount. Damage scales up to twice the initial damage as the beam fires.
fields.name: Sun Ray

fields.lore: Mt. Joerlak was a somewhat unstable mass, and Magnus has learned to channel its reverberations.
fields.description: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line.
fields.name: Shockwave

fields.lore: Magnoceros horns are valuable in direct proportion to their danger to prospective merchants.
fields.description: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk.  Heroes hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and slowed.
fields.name: Skewer
fields.notes: Doesn't affect magic immune units.

fields.lore: Magnus fights with the fury of the erupting Mt. Joerlak.
fields.description: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.
fields.name: Reverse Polarity
fields.notes: Disable and pull work through magic immunity.

fields.lore: With a deep bellow, Magnus displays his true power.
fields.description: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack.
fields.name: Empower
fields.notes: The bonus damage is based only on base damage and damage from primary attributes. Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. Ranged units cannot Cleave.

fields.lore: A simple Skywrath technique, the magic missile is Shendel's primary tool for vengeance.
fields.description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
fields.name: Magic Missile

fields.lore: Shendel's haunting voice hints at her approaching vindication.
fields.description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path.
fields.name: Wave of Terror

fields.name: Magic Missile

fields.lore: Martyrdom is a small price to pay for vengeance.
fields.description:
Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy.  Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Nether Swap
fields.notes: Works on magic immune units. Trees near Vengeful Spirit and the target will be destroyed when the spell is cast.

fields.lore: Although they may not share her undying passion for revenge, allies do draw on her fanaticism in combat.
fields.description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases nearby friendly units' physical damage.
fields.name: Vengeance Aura
fields.notes: The bonus damage provided by the aura is based on base damage and primary attribute.

fields.lore: While their carapace is relatively thin, it's guarded by a retractable field of razor-sharp spikes.
fields.description: When activated, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage.
fields.name: Spiked Carapace
fields.notes: The damage is calculated after all reductions. Spiked Carapace will only trigger on damage from other player controlled units.

fields.lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Impale
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.

fields.lore: The tome in Ultimyr describes one scarab with the ability eat away at the mind of lesser beings.
fields.description: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.
fields.name: Mana Burn

fields.lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Impale
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.

fields.name: Impale
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.

fields.lore: The scarab kills for the glory of his queen.
fields.description: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.
fields.name: Vendetta
fields.notes: Has a 0 second fadetime. If a spell is used to break the invisibility, or the invisibility expires, the bonus damage is lost.

fields.lore: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.
fields.description: Enchants a target damaging and silencing them if they cast a spell. If the enchantment expires the target will be disarmed in addition to being damaged and silenced.
fields.name: Last Word
fields.notes: Channeling abilities will trigger this affect once the caster finishes its channel.

fields.lore: Although lacking in traditional incantations, Nortrom's pedigree of the Aeol Drias gives him uncanny wisdom, which he applies to physical combat.
fields.description:
Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence. 

Glaives of Wisdom is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Glaives of Wisdom

fields.name: Last Word
fields.notes: Channeling abilities will trigger this affect once the caster finishes its channel.

fields.lore: With a shock to the ground, all magic and sound pauses, and Nortrom fulfills his prophecy.
fields.description:
Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Global Silence
fields.notes: This skill works on invisible and magic immune units, but gaining magic immunity will remove its effect.

fields.lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.
fields.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
fields.name: Rot
fields.notes: Using Rot doesn't interrupt channeling. Rot hits invisible units. If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated. Pudge can deny himself with this ability.

fields.lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.
fields.description: Launches a bloody hook at a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.
fields.name: Meat Hook
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy. Meat Hook hits invisible units. Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, and mechanical units. Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.

fields.lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Dismember
fields.notes: Dismember will disable magic immune units, but not damage them. If a unit becomes invisible while Dismembered, it will still be under the effects of Dismember.

fields.lore: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'
fields.description: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
fields.name: Flesh Heap
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.
fields.description: Rushes to a target location while slowing the movement and attack speed of all enemies along its path for 3 seconds.
fields.name: Time Walk
fields.notes: Faceless Void is invulnerable while using Time Walk.

fields.lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.
fields.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.
fields.name: Time Lock
fields.notes: Stun works on magic immune units. Does not stack with Skull Basher. Deals twice as much damage if the unit is in Chronosphere.

fields.lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.
fields.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.
fields.name: Time Lock
fields.notes: Stun works on magic immune units. Does not stack with Skull Basher. Deals twice as much damage if the unit is in Chronosphere.

fields.lore: Darkterror sees what has yet to be seen.
fields.description: Faceless Void dodges damage by jumping backward in time, eluding both physical and magical attacks.
fields.name: Backtrack
fields.notes: Stacks with evasion. Abilities that grant True Strike don't work against Backtrack.

fields.lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.
fields.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.
fields.name: Time Lock
fields.notes: Stun works on magic immune units. Does not stack with Skull Basher. Deals twice as much damage if the unit is in Chronosphere.

fields.lore: When a rift opens to Claszureme, all poor souls caught within will likely never return.
fields.description:
Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Chronosphere
fields.notes: Pauses all units and buildings, friendly or enemy, except those owned by Faceless Void. Faceless Void is never affected by Chronospheres with any owner. Reveals invisible units.

fields.lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.
fields.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.
fields.name: Time Lock
fields.notes: Stun works on magic immune units. Does not stack with Skull Basher. Deals twice as much damage if the unit is in Chronosphere.

fields.lore: Darkterror sees what has yet to be seen.
fields.description: Faceless Void dodges damage by jumping backward in time, eluding both physical and magical attacks.
fields.name: Backtrack
fields.notes: Stacks with evasion. Abilities that grant True Strike don't work against Backtrack.

fields.lore: Darkterror sees what has yet to be seen.

fields.lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.
fields.description: Rushes to a target location while slowing the movement and attack speed of all enemies along its path for 3 seconds.
fields.name: Time Walk
fields.notes: Faceless Void is invulnerable while using Time Walk.

fields.lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.
fields.description: Rushes to a target location while slowing the movement and attack speed of all enemies along its path for 3 seconds.

fields.lore: There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade.  Facing MORE Terrrorblades!
fields.description: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.
fields.name: Conjure Image

fields.lore: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
fields.description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack.
fields.name: Metamorphosis

fields.description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack.
fields.name: Metamorphosis

fields.lore: You didn't need that life, did you?  The demon marauder steals that which you hold most dear.
fields.description: Severs the soul from both Terrorblade and a target hero, then exchanges them, carrying part of the units' life forces. The percentage hit points of each unit are switched with the souls. Some hit points must remain.
fields.name: Sunder

fields.lore: In the fractal prison of Foulfell, Terrorblade learned the truth of this old tale: you are your own worst enemy.  Now it is a lesson he teaches others.
fields.description: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark illusion of the targeted enemy Hero. The enemy Hero is slowed and attacked by the illusion for a short duration.
fields.name: Reflection
fields.notes: Reflections are untargetable, invulnernable illusions. Reflections can only attack their source.

fields.lore: You didn't need that life, did you?  The demon marauder steals that which you hold most dear.
fields.description: Severs the soul from both Terrorblade and a target hero, then exchanges them, carrying part of the units' life forces. The percentage hit points of each unit are switched with the souls. Some hit points must remain.
fields.name: Sunder

fields.description: Allows manipulation of ice elements and grants a permanent strength bonus. Each Quas instance provides increased health regeneration.
fields.name: Quas
fields.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

fields.lore: So begins a new age of knowledge.
fields.description:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated, creating a new spell at the Invoker's disposal. Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Invoke
fields.notes: The arrangement of instances does not matter.

fields.lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.
fields.description: Grants bonus damage to nearby allies, while blessing Luna with extra night vision.
fields.name: Lunar Blessing

fields.lore: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.
fields.description: Luna channels a concentrated beam of lunar energy at an enemy, stunning and dealing damage.
fields.name: Lucent Beam

fields.lore: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.
fields.description: Luna channels a concentrated beam of lunar energy at an enemy, stunning and dealing damage.
fields.name: Lucent Beam

fields.lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.
fields.description: Grants bonus damage to nearby allies, while blessing Luna with extra night vision.
fields.name: Lunar Blessing

fields.lore: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.
fields.description: Luna channels a concentrated beam of lunar energy at an enemy, stunning and dealing damage.
fields.name: Lucent Beam

fields.lore: In times of great need, Selemene herself descends into the world, blocking out the light and hope of the opposed.
fields.description:
Calls an eclipse that follows Luna, striking units with her current level of Lucent Beam.  A single target can only be hit a maximum times.  Unlike individual Lucent Beams, Eclipse does not stun.  Eclipse turns day into night for 10 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Eclipse
fields.notes: Eclipse doesn't work if Luna doesn't have any points in Lucent Beam. Beams will stop if Luna is killed. Eclipse Lucent Beams do not stun. Will not hit invisible units.

fields.lore: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.
fields.description: Luna channels a concentrated beam of lunar energy at an enemy, stunning and dealing damage.
fields.name: Lucent Beam

fields.lore: Carefully sharpened, Luna's boomerang-like weapon cuts a wide swath through enemy numbers.
fields.description: Allows Luna's glaive to bounce to enemy units near the attacked unit. Each bounce deals less damage.
fields.name: Moon Glaive

fields.lore: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.
fields.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
fields.name: Shukuchi
fields.notes: Can only damage the same unit once per cast.

fields.lore: Skitskurr's relationship with time is somewhat variable, causing his actions to be witnessed - and felt - more than once.
fields.description:
Allows Weaver to dispatch two swarms, attacking an enemy twice.

The extra attack will not trigger other attack effects (such as critical strike) and overrides Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Geminate Attack

fields.lore: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.
fields.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
fields.name: Shukuchi
fields.notes: Can only damage the same unit once per cast.

fields.lore: Skitskurr opens a gap in the space time fabric, allowing young Weavers to slip through and aid him in combat.
fields.description: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.
fields.name: The Swarm
fields.notes: When a beetle latches on a target, it will remain there until it is killed or the duration expires. Beetles are magic immune, but can be killed in 4 attacks from a hero, or 8 from other units. Every 1.35 seconds, the beetle will attack its target, dealing damage and reducing the target's armor by 1 until the beetle is killed or the duration expires. Beetles provide 321/321 sight, but will drop off their target if it becomes invisible.

fields.lore: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.
fields.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
fields.name: Shukuchi
fields.notes: Can only damage the same unit once per cast.

fields.lore: If Skitskurr does not deem the current reality of the world to fit his desires, he simply crawls back in time to right what was wronged.
fields.description: Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.
fields.name: Time Lapse
fields.notes: Removes most negative buffs from Weaver.

fields.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
fields.description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.
fields.name: Counter Helix
fields.notes: Counter Helix checks for triggering whenever an attack against Axe begins, not when Axe is actually damaged by said attack.

fields.lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.
fields.description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
fields.name: Berserker's Call
fields.notes: Affects units with magic immunity.

fields.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.

fields.name: Counter Helix
fields.notes: Counter Helix checks for triggering whenever an attack against Axe begins, not when Axe is actually damaged by said attack.

fields.lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.
fields.description:
Axe spots weakness and strikes, dealing moderate damage but instantly killing an enemy unit with low health.  When an enemy hero is killed in this way, the cooldown is reset. Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Culling Blade
fields.notes: The killing blow goes through magic immunity.

fields.name: Berserker's Call
fields.notes: Affects units with magic immunity.

fields.lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
fields.description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.
fields.name: Battle Hunger
fields.notes: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff. Units affected by Battle Hunger cannot be denied.

fields.lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.
fields.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
fields.name: Hex
fields.notes: Instantly destroys illusions. The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled. Hex disables damage block and evasion.

fields.lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Earth Spike
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second.

fields.lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
fields.description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
fields.name: Mana Drain
fields.notes: Destroys illusions after 0.25 seconds.

fields.lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
fields.description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.

fields.name: Earth Spike
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second.

fields.lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.
fields.description:
Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Finger of Death
fields.notes: Finger of Death has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.

fields.lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.
fields.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
fields.name: Hex
fields.notes: Instantly destroys illusions. The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled. Hex disables damage block and evasion.

fields.lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.
fields.description:
Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Finger of Death
fields.notes: Finger of Death has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.

fields.lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.

fields.lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
fields.description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
fields.name: Mana Drain
fields.notes: Destroys illusions after 0.25 seconds.

fields.lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
fields.description: Fires an arrow with deadly precision, dealing large damage and stunning the first enemy unit it strikes. Stun duration increases based on distance to target, ranging from 0.5 to 5 seconds. Bonus damage up to 100 is applied based on distance to target.
fields.name: Sacred Arrow
fields.notes: For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds. Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.

fields.lore: Both friend and foe alike recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.
fields.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 10 seconds.
fields.name: Leap
fields.notes: You can use Leap to dodge incoming projectiles.

fields.lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
fields.description: Fires an arrow with deadly precision, dealing large damage and stunning the first enemy unit it strikes. Stun duration increases based on distance to target, ranging from 0.5 to 5 seconds. Bonus damage up to 100 is applied based on distance to target.
fields.name: Sacred Arrow
fields.notes: For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds. Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.

fields.lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
fields.description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. One random enemy unit in 175 range will take a second hit for 75% of the damage.
fields.name: Starstorm
fields.notes: Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere. Starstorm cannot hit invisible units. Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.

fields.lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
fields.description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If Invisibility is broken, it will restore after fade delay if the shadow's duration has not expired.  Silence will stop Moonlight Shadow.
fields.name: Moonlight Shadow
fields.notes: Units affected will not auto attack enemies. Magic immune allies will be affected.

fields.lore: Even the Grandest Magus may use his powers for enjoyment.
fields.description: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.
fields.name: Telekinesis
fields.notes: While the target is in the air, Rubick may use a secondary ability to throw the enemy in a targeted direction. When the unit lands, it isn't affected by the area of effect stun. The farthest you can throw an enemy is 375.

fields.lore: Rubick's favorite spell for dispatching would-be assassins is a rather simple conjuration.
fields.description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage.  Each jump deals less damage.
fields.name: Fade Bolt

fields.lore: Rubick's favorite spell for dispatching would-be assassins is a rather simple conjuration.
fields.description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage.  Each jump deals less damage.

fields.lore: Rubick's favorite spell for dispatching would-be assassins is a rather simple conjuration.
fields.description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage.  Each jump deals less damage.
fields.name: Fade Bolt

fields.lore: ...but even their lesser magics can be a source of much utility.
fields.description:
Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Spell Steal
fields.notes: Cannot steal item abilities.

fields.lore: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...
fields.description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane protects his allies against weaker magics, granting them magic resistance.
fields.name: Null Field
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: When an enemy escapes into the Yama Raskav Jungle, most would cut through the brush to find the fugitive.  Batrider just chooses to destroy the jungle along with his foes.
fields.description: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a flaming trail from the air.  While flying, the trail of fire destroys trees and damages enemies in its path, and Batrider gains the movement capabilities of a flying unit.
fields.name: Firefly
fields.notes: During this the Batrider can fly above units, trees and impassable terrain. If duration ends when above impassable terrain, the Batrider can get stuck. The fire destroys trees. The trail persists through Batrider's death.

fields.lore: It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.
fields.description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks.
fields.name: Sticky Napalm
fields.notes: All damage from Batrider gets amplified, except for Radiance and Orb of Venom.

fields.lore: When an enemy escapes into the Yama Raskav Jungle, most would cut through the brush to find the fugitive.  Batrider just chooses to destroy the jungle along with his foes.

fields.name: Firefly
fields.notes: During this the Batrider can fly above units, trees and impassable terrain. If duration ends when above impassable terrain, the Batrider can get stuck. The fire destroys trees. The trail persists through Batrider's death.

fields.lore: Few dare to ask to ride on the bat, as Batrider gives them free of charge.
fields.description: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.
fields.name: Flaming Lasso
fields.notes: Killing the target or the Batrider will break the lasso before its expiration. If Batrider moves more than 400 units in 0.05 seconds the lasso breaks. Disable works on magic immune units. Batrider cannot attack while using Flaming Lasso.

fields.lore: It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.
fields.description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks.
fields.name: Sticky Napalm
fields.notes: All damage from Batrider gets amplified, except for Radiance and Orb of Venom.

fields.lore: A molotov cocktail is the weapon of choice for Batrider.
fields.description: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back and dealing damage to enemies in the area.
fields.name: Flamebreak

fields.lore: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.
fields.description: Nearby friendly units gain hit points based on their damage dealt when attacking enemy units.
fields.name: Vampiric Aura
fields.notes: Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.

fields.lore: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.
fields.description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.
fields.name: Wraithfire Blast
fields.notes: Deals 80 / 160 / 230 / 300 total damage.

fields.lore: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.
fields.description: Wraith King's members regroup after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in the area will be slowed by 50%.
fields.name: Reincarnation
fields.notes: Wraith King won't revive if he doesn't have enough mana. If Wraith King has an Aegis and Reincarnation off cooldown, Reincarnation will trigger first. Revives with full HP and Mana.

fields.description: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
fields.name: Searing Chains
fields.notes: Targets are chosen randomly around Xin. Does not affect magic immune or invisible units. Interrupts channeling spells.

fields.description: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes, and less damage to creeps.
fields.name: Sleight of Fist
fields.notes: Targets are determined when the spell is cast. A regular attack is done to each target every 0.2 seconds. Any attack modifier that Xin has (such as Critical Strike, Bash, Cleave, or Orb effects) will be applied normally on these attacks.

fields.description: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes, and less damage to creeps.

fields.name: Searing Chains

fields.description: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
fields.name: Searing Chains
fields.notes: Targets are chosen randomly around Xin. Does not affect magic immune or invisible units. Interrupts channeling spells.

fields.description: Ember Spirit generates Fire Remnant charges every 35 seconds, with a max of 3 charges.  Releasing a charge sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 2.5x Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit can dash out to his Remnants, exploding them for area of effect damage.  The targeted Remnant will be arrived at last.
fields.name: Fire Remnant
fields.notes: Starts with 3 charges (maximum). Fire Remnants move to where you targeted them at 2.5x your speed.

fields.description: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes, and less damage to creeps.

fields.name: Sleight of Fist
fields.notes: Targets are determined when the spell is cast. A regular attack is done to each target every 0.2 seconds. Any attack modifier that Xin has (such as Critical Strike, Bash, Cleave, or Orb effects) will be applied normally on these attacks.

fields.description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
fields.name: Flame Guard
fields.notes: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.

fields.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
fields.description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.
fields.name: Counter Helix
fields.notes: Counter Helix checks for triggering whenever an attack against Axe begins, not when Axe is actually damaged by said attack.

fields.lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
fields.description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.
fields.name: Battle Hunger
fields.notes: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff. Units affected by Battle Hunger cannot be denied.

fields.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
fields.description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.
fields.name: Counter Helix
fields.notes: Counter Helix checks for triggering whenever an attack against Axe begins, not when Axe is actually damaged by said attack.

fields.lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.
fields.description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
fields.name: Berserker's Call
fields.notes: Affects units with magic immunity.

fields.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
fields.description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.
fields.name: Counter Helix
fields.notes: Counter Helix checks for triggering whenever an attack against Axe begins, not when Axe is actually damaged by said attack.

fields.lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.
fields.description:
Axe spots weakness and strikes, dealing moderate damage but instantly killing an enemy unit with low health.  When an enemy hero is killed in this way, the cooldown is reset. Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Culling Blade
fields.notes: The killing blow goes through magic immunity.

fields.description:

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Culling Blade
fields.notes: The killing blow goes through magic immunity.

fields.lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
fields.description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.
fields.name: Battle Hunger
fields.notes: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff. Units affected by Battle Hunger cannot be denied.

fields.lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Impale
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.

fields.lore: While their carapace is relatively thin, it's guarded by a retractable field of razor-sharp spikes.
fields.description: When activated, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage.
fields.name: Spiked Carapace
fields.notes: The damage is calculated after all reductions. Spiked Carapace will only trigger on damage from other player controlled units.

fields.lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Impale
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.

fields.lore: The tome in Ultimyr describes one scarab with the ability eat away at the mind of lesser beings.
fields.description: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.
fields.name: Mana Burn

fields.lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Impale
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.

fields.lore: The scarab kills for the glory of his queen.
fields.description: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.
fields.name: Vendetta
fields.notes: Has a 0 second fadetime. If a spell is used to break the invisibility, or the invisibility expires, the bonus damage is lost.

fields.lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.
fields.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
fields.name: Hex
fields.notes: Instantly destroys illusions. The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled. Hex disables damage block and evasion.

fields.lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Earth Spike
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second.

fields.lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Earth Spike
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second.

fields.lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
fields.description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
fields.name: Mana Drain
fields.notes: Destroys illusions after 0.25 seconds.

fields.lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Earth Spike
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second.

fields.lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.
fields.description:
Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Finger of Death
fields.notes: Finger of Death has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.

fields.description: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
fields.name: Searing Chains
fields.notes: Targets are chosen randomly around Xin. Does not affect magic immune or invisible units. Interrupts channeling spells.

fields.description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
fields.name: Flame Guard
fields.notes: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.

fields.description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
fields.name: Flame Guard
fields.notes: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.

fields.description: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
fields.name: Searing Chains
fields.notes: Targets are chosen randomly around Xin. Does not affect magic immune or invisible units. Interrupts channeling spells.

fields.description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
fields.name: Flame Guard
fields.notes: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.

fields.description: Ember Spirit generates Fire Remnant charges every 35 seconds, with a max of 3 charges.  Releasing a charge sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 2.5x Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit can dash out to his Remnants, exploding them for area of effect damage.  The targeted Remnant will be arrived at last.
fields.name: Fire Remnant
fields.notes: Starts with 3 charges (maximum). Fire Remnants move to where you targeted them at 2.5x your speed.

fields.description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
fields.name: Flame Guard
fields.notes: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.

fields.description: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
fields.name: Searing Chains
fields.notes: Targets are chosen randomly around Xin. Does not affect magic immune or invisible units. Interrupts channeling spells.

fields.description: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
fields.name: Searing Chains
fields.notes: Targets are chosen randomly around Xin. Does not affect magic immune or invisible units. Interrupts channeling spells.

fields.description: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes, and less damage to creeps.
fields.name: Sleight of Fist
fields.notes: Targets are determined when the spell is cast. A regular attack is done to each target every 0.2 seconds. Any attack modifier that Xin has (such as Critical Strike, Bash, Cleave, or Orb effects) will be applied normally on these attacks.

fields.lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.
fields.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.
fields.name: Arc Lightning

fields.lore: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.
fields.description: Zeus shocks all nearby enemy units whenever he casts a spell, causing damage proportional to their current health.
fields.name: Static Field
fields.notes: The damage from Static Field is dealt before the damage from the used spell. Using items doesn't trigger Static Field. Does not require unit visibility to take effect.

fields.lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.
fields.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.
fields.name: Arc Lightning

fields.lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
fields.description: Summons a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. Lightning Bolt also provides True Sight around the target in a radius of 900.
fields.name: Lightning Bolt
fields.notes: You can interrupt channeling spells and items with this ability.

fields.lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
fields.description: Summons a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. Lightning Bolt also provides True Sight around the target in a radius of 900.
fields.name: Lightning Bolt
fields.notes: You can interrupt channeling spells and items with this ability.

fields.lore: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.
fields.description:
Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Thundergod's Wrath
