fields.lore: Sometimes breaking one of the Riftshadow Crystals can be just the trick for getting yourself out of a bind.  Or your other self.
fields.description: Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1.5 seconds, dealing damage in both the departure and arrival locations.
fields.name: Poof
fields.notes: Can be cast through the minimap. Can teleport to Meepo illusions.

fields.lore: Catching dinner in the Riftshadow Ruins can be quite the task.
fields.description: Tosses a net at the target point, pinning down all enemy units.  Earthbind prevents invisibility, blink, and interrupts channeling.
fields.name: Earthbind
fields.notes: While preventing units from going invisible, Earthbind won't hit units that are already invisible. Does not work on magic immune units or Roshan.

fields.lore: Do I know you?
fields.description:
Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears.  If any of the clones die, they all die. Increases the speed at which you respawn. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Divided We Stand
fields.notes: Clones can't use Arcane Boots or pick up runes.

fields.lore: Sometimes breaking one of the Riftshadow Crystals can be just the trick for getting yourself out of a bind.  Or your other self.
fields.description: Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1.5 seconds, dealing damage in both the departure and arrival locations.
fields.name: Poof
fields.notes: Can be cast through the minimap. Can teleport to Meepo illusions.

fields.name: Poof
fields.notes: Can be cast through the minimap. Can teleport to Meepo illusions.

fields.lore: Keeping your pack light and having few but versatile tools is the best bet for survival.
fields.description: Meepo enchants his weapon to deal damage per second, as well as slow the movement speed of the attacked unit.  Geostrikes from multiple Meepos stack.
fields.name: Geostrike
fields.notes: Slows magic immune units.

fields.description: Tosses a net at the target point, pinning down all enemy units.  Earthbind prevents invisibility, blink, and interrupts channeling.
fields.name: Earthbind
fields.notes: While preventing units from going invisible, Earthbind won't hit units that are already invisible. Does not work on magic immune units or Roshan.

fields.lore: Catching dinner in the Riftshadow Ruins can be quite the task.

fields.lore: Do I know you?
fields.description:
Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears.  If any of the clones die, they all die. Increases the speed at which you respawn. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Divided We Stand
fields.notes: Clones can't use Arcane Boots or pick up runes.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
fields.description: Summons a Healing Ward that heals all nearby allied units, based on their max hit points.  The Healing Ward can move at 450 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
fields.name: Healing Ward
fields.notes: The healing ward can be controlled. Multiple healing wards don't stack.

fields.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
fields.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 175-250 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Omnislash
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target. Can target magic immune units. Slashes happen on an interval of 0.4 seconds. Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash. You can use items during Omnislash.

fields.lore: Playing with electricity can have unexpected results.
fields.description: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions.
fields.name: Glimpse
fields.notes: The travel time is a function of the distance the target will travel.

fields.lore: Disruptor's charged coils occasionally overload, and a singed armor plate or tuft of fur is the enemy's result.
fields.description: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius.
fields.name: Thunder Strike

fields.lore: The stryder is immune to the gale-force winds that will consume its adversaries.
fields.description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.
fields.name: Kinetic Field
fields.notes: Magic immune units can travel through the field.

fields.description:
Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.

fields.lore: Time in the Dark Reef made Slark a dangerous assassin; aggressive and fearless.
fields.description: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit takes damage and is leashed to Slark, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.
fields.name: Pounce
fields.notes: On cast, Slark leaps forward at a speed of 933.33, stopping when he latches onto an enemy hero or has traveled 700 distance. Magic immune units cannot be leashed. Trees will be destroyed around Slark's landing location. Blinking or teleporting can break the leash.

fields.lore: With each strike at his adversaries, Slark's knowledge of their weaknesses improves.
fields.description: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility.
fields.name: Essence Shift
fields.notes: Attributes cannot be dropped below 1. When either Slark or the affected unit dies, the stats are returned to normal.

fields.lore: Time in the Dark Reef made Slark a dangerous assassin; aggressive and fearless.
fields.description: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit takes damage and is leashed to Slark, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.
fields.name: Pounce
fields.notes: On cast, Slark leaps forward at a speed of 933.33, stopping when he latches onto an enemy hero or has traveled 700 distance. Magic immune units cannot be leashed. Trees will be destroyed around Slark's landing location. Blinking or teleporting can break the leash.

fields.lore: Slithereen are capable of quickly regrowing appendages, in case of critical injury, to save their own lives.
fields.description: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes 50% of the damage.
fields.name: Dark Pact
fields.notes: 1.5 seconds after cast, a series of 10 pulses separated by 0.1 seconds deal the damage. Each pulse also removes buffs from Slark. You can't kill yourself with this skill. The pulses stop if Slark dies.

fields.lore: Time in the Dark Reef made Slark a dangerous assassin; aggressive and fearless.

fields.lore: The hidden Thirteenth is a slippery foe.
fields.description: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection (attacking, casting spells, and using items do not reveal Slark).  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.
fields.name: Shadow Dance
fields.notes: If Slark is damaged by a neutral unit, the effect is lost for 2 seconds.

fields.description: Allows manipulation of ice elements and grants a permanent strength bonus. Each Quas instance provides increased health regeneration.
fields.name: Quas
fields.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

fields.lore: So begins a new age of knowledge.
fields.description:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated, creating a new spell at the Invoker's disposal. Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Invoke
fields.notes: The arrangement of instances does not matter.

fields.description: Allows manipulation of storm elements and grants a permanent agility bonus. Each Wex instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.
fields.name: Wex
fields.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

fields.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
fields.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 hit points and deal 21-23 damage.
fields.name: Nature's Call
fields.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many trees there are in the target area. Treants have 20% magic resistance.

fields.lore: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.
fields.description: Teleports to any point on the map.
fields.name: Teleportation
fields.notes: Teleport takes 3 seconds to cast. Mana and cooldown take effect when the cast is completed.  Nature's Prophet will not use any mana or waste the cooldown if the spell is interrupted while casting. When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.

fields.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many trees there are in the target area. Treants have 20% magic resistance.

fields.lore: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.
fields.description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.
fields.name: Sprout
fields.notes: Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground. Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.

fields.lore: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.

When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.

fields.lore: Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.
fields.description:
Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Wrath of Nature
fields.notes: Wrath of Nature will not hit units out of vision. Can be cast through the minimap; the nearest valid target will be selected.

fields.lore: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.
fields.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
fields.name: Nether Blast
fields.notes: Damage is delayed by 0.9 seconds.

fields.lore: A now-mastered relic from his childhood, Pugna delights in banishing others into the Nether Realm, whether for good, evil, or simple enjoyment.
fields.description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage.
fields.name: Decrepify
fields.notes: Only magical and pure damage can affect a unit under the effects of Decrepify.

fields.lore: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.
fields.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
fields.name: Nether Blast
fields.notes: Damage is delayed by 0.9 seconds.

fields.lore: While at the lamasery for the Arts of Oblivion, Pugna learned to dominate his classmates with a simple ward charged with Nether magic.
fields.description: Pugna places a nether ward that fires mana flares at enemy heroes who dare to cast spells, while also preventing them from regenerating mana.  Nether Ward deals damage equal to the damage multiplier times the mana spent by the enemy hero.  Lasts 25 seconds.
fields.name: Nether Ward
fields.notes: Nether Ward deals damage before the actual spell is cast, so if the caster dies the spell will have no effect. Nether Ward can be decrepified. Nether Ward has 3 HP. Heroes can attack it for 1 damage, while non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.

fields.lore: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.
fields.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
fields.name: Nether Blast
fields.notes: Damage is delayed by 0.9 seconds.

fields.lore: Pugna has truly become more powerful than even the grandmaster of Oblivion.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - While channelling Life Drain, Pugna siphons HP of the target enemy unit. If you are full HP, it will restore mana instead. Lasts 10 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Life Drain
fields.notes: HP drained depends on the actual damage dealt. Illusions are destroyed on the first tick of damage.

fields.lore: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.
fields.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
fields.name: Nether Blast
fields.notes: Damage is delayed by 0.9 seconds.

fields.description: Pugna places a nether ward that fires mana flares at enemy heroes who dare to cast spells, while also preventing them from regenerating mana.  Nether Ward deals damage equal to the damage multiplier times the mana spent by the enemy hero.  Lasts 25 seconds.
fields.name: Nether Ward
fields.notes: Nether Ward deals damage before the actual spell is cast, so if the caster dies the spell will have no effect. Nether Ward can be decrepified. Nether Ward has 3 HP. Heroes can attack it for 1 damage, while non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.

fields.lore: While at the lamasery for the Arts of Oblivion, Pugna learned to dominate his classmates with a simple ward charged with Nether magic.
fields.description: Pugna places a nether ward that fires mana flares at enemy heroes who dare to cast spells, while also preventing them from regenerating mana.  Nether Ward deals damage equal to the damage multiplier times the mana spent by the enemy hero.  Lasts 25 seconds.
fields.name: Nether Ward
fields.notes: Nether Ward deals damage before the actual spell is cast, so if the caster dies the spell will have no effect. Nether Ward can be decrepified. Nether Ward has 3 HP. Heroes can attack it for 1 damage, while non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.

fields.lore: Pugna has truly become more powerful than even the grandmaster of Oblivion.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - While channelling Life Drain, Pugna siphons HP of the target enemy unit. If you are full HP, it will restore mana instead. Lasts 10 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Life Drain
fields.notes: HP drained depends on the actual damage dealt. Illusions are destroyed on the first tick of damage.

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
fields.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
fields.name: Crystal Nova

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts 7 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Freezing Field
fields.notes: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts 1 second). Every 0.1 second an explosion occurs, for a total of 70 explosions.

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
fields.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
fields.name: Crystal Nova

fields.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts 7 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Freezing Field
fields.notes: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts 1 second). Every 0.1 second an explosion occurs, for a total of 70 explosions.

fields.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
fields.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
fields.name: Crystal Nova

fields.lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
fields.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
fields.name: Tidebringer
fields.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. Cooldown isn't activated on denies, so the damage bonus is maintained.

fields.lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.
fields.description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
fields.name: Torrent
fields.notes: The initial bubble effect is only visible to allies. Units tossed in the air will be stunned and still able to be attacked.

fields.lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
fields.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
fields.name: Tidebringer
fields.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. Cooldown isn't activated on denies, so the damage bonus is maintained.

fields.lore: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.
fields.description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration.
fields.name: X Marks the Spot
fields.notes: If the target becomes magic immune after the cast, the target will not return to the X after the duration. Interrupts channeling spells.

fields.lore: There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade.  Facing MORE Terrrorblades!
fields.description: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.
fields.name: Conjure Image

fields.lore: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
fields.description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack.
fields.name: Metamorphosis

fields.lore: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
fields.description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack.
fields.name: Metamorphosis

fields.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
fields.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, fissuring the earth while stunning and damaging enemy units in a line.  Creates an impassable ridge of stone.
fields.name: Fissure

fields.lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
fields.description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
fields.name: Aftershock
fields.notes: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.

fields.lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
fields.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.
fields.name: Storm Hammer

fields.lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!
fields.description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 7 seconds.
fields.name: Warcry
fields.notes: Fully stacks with other armor and speed granting abilities.

fields.lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
fields.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.
fields.name: Storm Hammer

fields.lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.
fields.description: Rushes to a target location while slowing the movement and attack speed of all enemies along its path for 3 seconds.
fields.name: Time Walk
fields.notes: Faceless Void is invulnerable while using Time Walk.

fields.lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.
fields.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.
fields.name: Time Lock
fields.notes: Stun works on magic immune units. Does not stack with Skull Basher. Deals twice as much damage if the unit is in Chronosphere.

fields.lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.
fields.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.
fields.name: Time Lock
fields.notes: Stun works on magic immune units. Does not stack with Skull Basher. Deals twice as much damage if the unit is in Chronosphere.

fields.lore: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.
fields.description: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot. The arrow deals damage to enemy units and destroys trees in its path. Damage is greatest on first target, and reduces by 10% for each target it pierces thereafter.  If the channeling is cancelled early, the shot will still occur but deal less damage.
fields.name: Powershot
fields.notes: The arrow initially moves at 3000 units per second, but slowed a little each time it hits an enemy or tree. Powershot will destroy trees in its area of effect.

fields.lore: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.
fields.description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.
fields.name: Windrun
fields.notes: The slow will affect enemies with magic immunity. Windrun will not evade projectiles that were created before it was activated.

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to blend with all spectrums of light.
fields.description: Renders Phantom Lancer invisible, while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies.
fields.name: Doppelwalk

fields.lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
fields.description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
fields.name: Static Remnant
fields.notes: Remnants take 1 second to materialize after the spell is cast. Remnants grant flying vision for their duration. The explosion actually hits units in a 260 radius, but will only be triggered in 235.

fields.lore: Pow!  Zip!  Zap!
fields.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
fields.name: Overload
fields.notes: Using items doesn't trigger Overload.

fields.lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
fields.description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50% for 3 seconds.
fields.name: Electric Vortex

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.
fields.description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
fields.name: Chaos Bolt

fields.lore: Armageddon rides between the planes, bringing Chaos Knight to his victim wherever he may hide.
fields.description: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a random point along the line between the two of you. Gives you bonus attack damage for one attack.
fields.name: Reality Rift
fields.notes: Chaos Knight and the target unit are made to face each other, and Chaos Knight and his illusions are issued an attack order against the target.

fields.lore: It was not unheard of Ethreain to make examples out of those who contested his rule during his human life.
fields.description: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich. Grants XP to both enemies and allies.
fields.name: Sacrifice

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: It was not unheard of Ethreain to make examples out of those who contested his rule during his human life.
fields.description: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich. Grants XP to both enemies and allies.
fields.name: Sacrifice

fields.lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.
fields.description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, dealing damage and gaining health equal to the damage dealt.
fields.name: Brain Sap
fields.notes: Bane always receives the full amount of health, regardless of the amount of damage dealt.

fields.lore: It was not unheard of Ethreain to make examples out of those who contested his rule during his human life.
fields.description: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich. Grants XP to both enemies and allies.
fields.name: Sacrifice

fields.lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.
fields.description:
Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Echo Slam
fields.notes: Will not damage ethereal units. The initial damage will go through magic immunity; the additional damage will not. Units creating echoes also take damage from the wave they produced.

fields.lore: It was not unheard of Ethreain to make examples out of those who contested his rule during his human life.
fields.description: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich. Grants XP to both enemies and allies.
fields.name: Sacrifice

fields.lore: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.
fields.description: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.
fields.name: Earthshock

fields.lore: With each strike at his adversaries, Slark's knowledge of their weaknesses improves.
fields.description: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility.
fields.name: Essence Shift
fields.notes: Attributes cannot be dropped below 1. When either Slark or the affected unit dies, the stats are returned to normal.

fields.lore: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.
fields.description: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.
fields.name: Earthshock

fields.lore: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.
fields.description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration.
fields.name: X Marks the Spot
fields.notes: If the target becomes magic immune after the cast, the target will not return to the X after the duration. Interrupts channeling spells.

fields.lore: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.
fields.description: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.
fields.name: Earthshock

fields.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
fields.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, fissuring the earth while stunning and damaging enemy units in a line.  Creates an impassable ridge of stone.
fields.name: Fissure

fields.lore: One of Clockwerk's inventions of which he is most proud is the power cog - though it is sometimes despised by his allies.
fields.description: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.
fields.name: Power Cogs
fields.notes: Cogs can shock invisible units.

fields.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
fields.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, fissuring the earth while stunning and damaging enemy units in a line.  Creates an impassable ridge of stone.
fields.name: Fissure

fields.lore: Slithereen are capable of quickly regrowing appendages, in case of critical injury, to save their own lives.
fields.description: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes 50% of the damage.
fields.name: Dark Pact
fields.notes: 1.5 seconds after cast, a series of 10 pulses separated by 0.1 seconds deal the damage. Each pulse also removes buffs from Slark. You can't kill yourself with this skill. The pulses stop if Slark dies.

fields.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
fields.description: Summons a Healing Ward that heals all nearby allied units, based on their max hit points.  The Healing Ward can move at 450 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
fields.name: Healing Ward
fields.notes: The healing ward can be controlled. Multiple healing wards don't stack.

fields.lore: Slithereen are capable of quickly regrowing appendages, in case of critical injury, to save their own lives.
fields.description: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes 50% of the damage.
fields.name: Dark Pact
fields.notes: 1.5 seconds after cast, a series of 10 pulses separated by 0.1 seconds deal the damage. Each pulse also removes buffs from Slark. You can't kill yourself with this skill. The pulses stop if Slark dies.

fields.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
fields.description: Summons a Healing Ward that heals all nearby allied units, based on their max hit points.  The Healing Ward can move at 450 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
fields.name: Healing Ward
fields.notes: The healing ward can be controlled. Multiple healing wards don't stack.

fields.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
fields.name: Tidebringer
fields.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. Cooldown isn't activated on denies, so the damage bonus is maintained.

fields.lore: With a deep bellow, Magnus displays his true power.
fields.description: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack.
fields.name: Empower
fields.notes: The bonus damage is based only on base damage and damage from primary attributes. Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. Ranged units cannot Cleave.

fields.lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
fields.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
fields.name: Tidebringer
fields.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. Cooldown isn't activated on denies, so the damage bonus is maintained.

fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
fields.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
fields.name: Tidebringer
fields.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. Cooldown isn't activated on denies, so the damage bonus is maintained.

fields.lore: 'Bombs Away!'
fields.description:
Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area.  Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing major damage and major slow; the second dealing minor damage and minor slow.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Call Down
fields.notes: The visual indicator is visible to allies only. The slow goes through magic immunity.

fields.lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
fields.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
fields.name: Tidebringer
fields.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. Cooldown isn't activated on denies, so the damage bonus is maintained.

fields.lore: With a deep bellow, Magnus displays his true power.
fields.description: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack.
fields.name: Empower
fields.notes: The bonus damage is based only on base damage and damage from primary attributes. Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. Ranged units cannot Cleave.

fields.lore: The biggest missile Aurel could possibly attach to his craft, The Bomb™ has carefully calculated aerodynamics and explosives for maximum impact.
fields.description: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target.  Homing Missile deals greater damage the further it has traveled.  Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.
fields.name: Homing Missile
fields.notes: Towers do half damage to the missile. The crosshair effect is visible to allies only. Maximum damage is reached when the missile is 1500 units away. The missile will follow and hit invisible units, but have no effect.

fields.lore: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.
fields.description:
Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

Fury Swipes is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Fury Swipes

fields.lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
fields.description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.
fields.name: Enchant Totem
fields.notes: Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.

fields.lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
fields.description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.
fields.name: Enchant Totem
fields.notes: Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.

fields.lore: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.
fields.description:
Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

Fury Swipes is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Fury Swipes

fields.lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every second based on the unit's maximum mana.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Fiend's Grip
fields.notes: Fiend's Grip will disable and drain mana from magic immune units, but not damage them.

fields.lore: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.
fields.description: Teleports to any point on the map.
fields.name: Teleportation
fields.notes: Teleport takes 3 seconds to cast. Mana and cooldown take effect when the cast is completed.  Nature's Prophet will not use any mana or waste the cooldown if the spell is interrupted while casting. When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.

fields.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four..
fields.description: Phantom Lancer's attacks have a chance to create illusions to confuse enemies.  Phantom Lancer himself counts as one towards the max images.
fields.name: Juxtapose

fields.lore: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.
fields.description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.
fields.name: Sprout
fields.notes: Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground. Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.

fields.lore: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.
fields.description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.
fields.name: Overpower
fields.notes: Overpower grants maximum increased attack speed. Overpower isn't removed by Black King Bar.

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.
fields.description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.
fields.name: Overpower
fields.notes: Overpower grants maximum increased attack speed. Overpower isn't removed by Black King Bar.

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: Time in the Dark Reef made Slark a dangerous assassin; aggressive and fearless.
fields.description: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit takes damage and is leashed to Slark, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.
fields.name: Pounce
fields.notes: On cast, Slark leaps forward at a speed of 933.33, stopping when he latches onto an enemy hero or has traveled 700 distance. Magic immune units cannot be leashed. Trees will be destroyed around Slark's landing location. Blinking or teleporting can break the leash.

fields.lore: Aurel's new craft has an increased payload for rockets, enhancing their rapid-fire capabilities.
fields.description: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts 3 seconds.
fields.name: Rocket Barrage
fields.notes: Rocket Barrage can't hit units Gyrocopter has no vision over.

fields.lore: Time in the Dark Reef made Slark a dangerous assassin; aggressive and fearless.
fields.description: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit takes damage and is leashed to Slark, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.
fields.name: Pounce
fields.notes: On cast, Slark leaps forward at a speed of 933.33, stopping when he latches onto an enemy hero or has traveled 700 distance. Magic immune units cannot be leashed. Trees will be destroyed around Slark's landing location. Blinking or teleporting can break the leash.

fields.lore: Aurel's new craft has an increased payload for rockets, enhancing their rapid-fire capabilities.
fields.description: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts 3 seconds.
fields.name: Rocket Barrage
fields.notes: Rocket Barrage can't hit units Gyrocopter has no vision over.

fields.lore: Time in the Dark Reef made Slark a dangerous assassin; aggressive and fearless.
fields.description: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit takes damage and is leashed to Slark, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.
fields.name: Pounce
fields.notes: On cast, Slark leaps forward at a speed of 933.33, stopping when he latches onto an enemy hero or has traveled 700 distance. Magic immune units cannot be leashed. Trees will be destroyed around Slark's landing location. Blinking or teleporting can break the leash.

fields.lore: Locked away in the pocket between this world and the Outworld, victims realize their infantile knowledge and mortality.
fields.description: Places a target allied or enemy hero into an astral prison.  The hidden hero is invulnerable and disabled.  When cast on an enemy Hero, Harbinger temporarily steals intelligence from that hero.
fields.name: Astral Imprisonment
fields.notes: If used on an ally, no intelligence is stolen. Imprisoned units are hidden and invulnerable. Imprisoned units can still be hit by Sanity's Eclipse.

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.
fields.description: Channels a ball of light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, the ball deals damage and gives vision in a line.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage dealt.
fields.name: Illuminate
fields.notes: Gives increasing vision over the channeling time. Damages mechanical units.

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.
fields.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
fields.name: Dragon Blood

fields.lore: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.
fields.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.
fields.name: Dragon Tail

fields.lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.
fields.description: Rushes to a target location while slowing the movement and attack speed of all enemies along its path for 3 seconds.
fields.name: Time Walk
fields.notes: Faceless Void is invulnerable while using Time Walk.

fields.lore: Aspiring heroes gain speed and power from simply observing the Spirit Breaker's dominance on the battle field.
fields.description: Causes the Spirit Breaker to gain power with higher movement speed. His presence increases the movement speed of nearby allied units.
fields.name: Empowering Haste

fields.lore: All who encounter the cursed Gorgon will feel her rage.
fields.description:
Medusa magically splits her shot into five arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.  

The extra targets will not receive other attack effects (such as critical strike) and Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Split Shot
fields.notes: Secondary targets will be the closest enemy units excluding the primary target. If illusions of Medusa are created while Split Shot is active, they will also have this ability.

fields.lore: The Gorgon's curse is her greatest strength.
fields.description: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage and stealing some mana. After it reaches its last target, it jumps back to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake deals more damage and steals more mana per jump.
fields.name: Mystic Snake
fields.notes: Only units with mana will steal and increment the mana steal. Mystic Snake cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: Combining his monk heritage with his newfound affinity for plague has a menacing result.
fields.description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
fields.name: Death Pulse
fields.notes: Death Pulse can't be disjointed. Can heal magic immune units.

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four..
fields.description: Phantom Lancer's attacks have a chance to create illusions to confuse enemies.  Phantom Lancer himself counts as one towards the max images.
fields.name: Juxtapose

fields.lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to blend with all spectrums of light.
fields.description: Renders Phantom Lancer invisible, while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies.
fields.name: Doppelwalk

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four..
fields.description: Phantom Lancer's attacks have a chance to create illusions to confuse enemies.  Phantom Lancer himself counts as one towards the max images.
fields.name: Juxtapose

fields.lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.
fields.description: Grants bonus damage to nearby allies, while blessing Luna with extra night vision.
fields.name: Lunar Blessing

fields.lore: Carefully sharpened, Luna's boomerang-like weapon cuts a wide swath through enemy numbers.
fields.description: Allows Luna's glaive to bounce to enemy units near the attacked unit. Each bounce deals less damage.
fields.name: Moon Glaive

fields.lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.
fields.description: Grants bonus damage to nearby allies, while blessing Luna with extra night vision.
fields.name: Lunar Blessing

fields.lore: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.
fields.description: Luna channels a concentrated beam of lunar energy at an enemy, stunning and dealing damage.
fields.name: Lucent Beam

fields.lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.
fields.description: Grants bonus damage to nearby allies, while blessing Luna with extra night vision.
fields.name: Lunar Blessing

fields.lore: In times of great need, Selemene herself descends into the world, blocking out the light and hope of the opposed.
fields.description:
Calls an eclipse that follows Luna, striking units with her current level of Lucent Beam.  A single target can only be hit a maximum times.  Unlike individual Lucent Beams, Eclipse does not stun.  Eclipse turns day into night for 10 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Eclipse
fields.notes: Eclipse doesn't work if Luna doesn't have any points in Lucent Beam. Beams will stop if Luna is killed. Eclipse Lucent Beams do not stun. Will not hit invisible units.

fields.lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.
fields.description: Grants bonus damage to nearby allies, while blessing Luna with extra night vision.
fields.name: Lunar Blessing

fields.lore: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.
fields.description: Luna channels a concentrated beam of lunar energy at an enemy, stunning and dealing damage.
fields.name: Lucent Beam

fields.lore: The rallying horn of the Bronze Legion is able to inspire any heart.
fields.description: Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus attack speed and health regen for a short time.
fields.name: Press The Attack

fields.lore: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.
fields.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
fields.name: Nether Blast
fields.notes: Damage is delayed by 0.9 seconds.

fields.lore: A now-mastered relic from his childhood, Pugna delights in banishing others into the Nether Realm, whether for good, evil, or simple enjoyment.
fields.description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage.
fields.name: Decrepify
fields.notes: Only magical and pure damage can affect a unit under the effects of Decrepify.

fields.lore: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.
fields.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
fields.name: Nether Blast
fields.notes: Damage is delayed by 0.9 seconds.

fields.lore: A now-mastered relic from his childhood, Pugna delights in banishing others into the Nether Realm, whether for good, evil, or simple enjoyment.
fields.description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage.
fields.name: Decrepify
fields.notes: Only magical and pure damage can affect a unit under the effects of Decrepify.

fields.lore: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
fields.description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack.
fields.name: Metamorphosis

fields.lore: There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade.  Facing MORE Terrrorblades!
fields.description: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.
fields.name: Conjure Image

fields.lore: There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade.  Facing MORE Terrrorblades!
fields.description: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.
fields.name: Conjure Image

fields.lore: In the fractal prison of Foulfell, Terrorblade learned the truth of this old tale: you are your own worst enemy.  Now it is a lesson he teaches others.
fields.description: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark illusion of the targeted enemy Hero. The enemy Hero is slowed and attacked by the illusion for a short duration.
fields.name: Reflection
fields.notes: Reflections are untargetable, invulnernable illusions. Reflections can only attack their source.

fields.lore: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
fields.description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack.
fields.name: Metamorphosis

fields.lore: You didn't need that life, did you?  The demon marauder steals that which you hold most dear.
fields.description: Severs the soul from both Terrorblade and a target hero, then exchanges them, carrying part of the units' life forces. The percentage hit points of each unit are switched with the souls. Some hit points must remain.
fields.name: Sunder

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Azwraith accepts his fate, embracing his infinite army of phantoms.
fields.description: Phantom Lancer hones his abilities.  Improves chance of Juxtaposing, and the Juxtapose illusions can now create their own illusions.  Phantom Edge also increases Phantom Lancer's magic resistance.
fields.name: Phantom Edge
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.description: Phantom Lancer's attacks have a chance to create illusions to confuse enemies.  Phantom Lancer himself counts as one towards the max images.

fields.name: Doppelwalk

fields.lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to blend with all spectrums of light.
fields.description: Renders Phantom Lancer invisible, while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies.
fields.name: Doppelwalk

fields.lore: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.
fields.name: Shadow Walk
fields.notes: Will not break most channeling of spells upon activation. The bonus damage is a separate instance, and isn't considered in Jinada's calculation.

fields.lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
fields.name: Jinada

fields.lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
fields.name: Jinada

fields.lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.
fields.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.
fields.name: Shuriken Toss
fields.notes: This spell interrupts channeling abilities.

fields.lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
fields.name: Jinada

fields.lore: Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.
fields.description: Tracks an enemy hero, giving True Sight of it and grants a gain in movement speed to allies near the hunted. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bounty in gold.
fields.name: Track
fields.notes: Bounty Hunter will get the bonus gold if the target dies while Track is active, regardless of how it died. Gives True Sight as well as shared vision of the target. Track's effect is only visible to allies. The allies that are receiving the bonus speed from Track are the ones that will receive the bonus gold. Bonus gold is reliable gold.

fields.description: Allows manipulation of ice elements and grants a permanent strength bonus. Each Quas instance provides increased health regeneration.
fields.name: Quas
fields.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

fields.lore: So begins a new age of knowledge.
fields.description:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated, creating a new spell at the Invoker's disposal. Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Invoke
fields.notes: The arrangement of instances does not matter.

fields.description: Allows manipulation of storm elements and grants a permanent agility bonus. Each Wex instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.
fields.name: Wex
fields.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

fields.description: Allows manipulation of storm elements and grants a permanent agility bonus. Each Wex instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.
fields.name: Wex
fields.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

fields.name: Wex

fields.name: Wex
fields.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

fields.description: Allows manipulation of fire elements and grants a permanent intelligence bonus. Each Exort instance provides increased attack damage.
fields.name: Exort
fields.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

fields.lore: Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.
fields.description: Gives control of an enemy or neutral creep, and gives it bonus hit points.
fields.name: Holy Persuasion
fields.notes: You can take control of only non-Ancient type creeps. When persuading a new creep above your max unit count, the oldest persuaded unit will die.

fields.lore: Knights of the Fold possess a fanatical form of magic that is considered quite unwieldy by most other users of arcane arts.
fields.description: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith.
fields.name: Test of Faith

fields.lore: Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.
fields.description: Gives control of an enemy or neutral creep, and gives it bonus hit points.
fields.name: Holy Persuasion
fields.notes: You can take control of only non-Ancient type creeps. When persuading a new creep above your max unit count, the oldest persuaded unit will die.

fields.description: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith.
fields.name: Test of Faith

fields.name: Holy Persuasion
fields.notes: You can take control of only non-Ancient type creeps. When persuading a new creep above your max unit count, the oldest persuaded unit will die.

fields.lore: Using the mental link with his thralls, Chen calls down restoration and well-being to those who share his fanaticism.
fields.description:
Fully regenerates any creeps under Chen's control and heals all allied heroes on the map.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Hand of God
fields.notes: Heals magic immune units.

fields.lore: Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.

fields.description: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith.
fields.name: Test of Faith

fields.lore: Knights of the Fold possess a fanatical form of magic that is considered quite unwieldy by most other users of arcane arts.
fields.description: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith.
fields.name: Test of Faith

fields.lore: Although Chen's brand of animal enthrallment isn't quite strong enough to control the minds of enemy heroes, it still tests their resolve in combat.
fields.description: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.
fields.name: Penitence
fields.notes: Bonus damage will always be physical (reduced by armor), regardless of the damage source.

fields.lore: Using the mental link with his thralls, Chen calls down restoration and well-being to those who share his fanaticism.
fields.description:
Fully regenerates any creeps under Chen's control and heals all allied heroes on the map.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Hand of God
fields.notes: Heals magic immune units.

fields.lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.
fields.description:
Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement.  Lasts 1.5 seconds on Heroes, and 7 seconds on creeps.

Frost Arrows is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.
fields.name: Frost Arrows
fields.notes: The slow duration is refreshed on successive casts.

fields.lore: Traxex' time spent alone in the forests of her Drow home has allowed her to teach other archers how to improve their bow skills.
fields.description: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied Hero units on the map based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.
fields.name: Precision Aura

fields.lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.
fields.description:
Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement.  Lasts 1.5 seconds on Heroes, and 7 seconds on creeps.

Frost Arrows is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.
fields.name: Frost Arrows
fields.notes: The slow duration is refreshed on successive casts.

fields.lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.
fields.description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to you.
fields.name: Gust

fields.lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.
fields.description:
Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement.  Lasts 1.5 seconds on Heroes, and 7 seconds on creeps.

Frost Arrows is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.
fields.name: Frost Arrows
fields.notes: The slow duration is refreshed on successive casts.

fields.lore: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.
fields.description: Drow's experiences in battle improve her accuracy and effectiveness in combat, providing a passive bonus to Agility. Grants no bonus if there are enemy heroes within a 400 AoE.
fields.name: Marksmanship

fields.lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.
fields.description:
Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement.  Lasts 1.5 seconds on Heroes, and 7 seconds on creeps.

Frost Arrows is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.
fields.name: Frost Arrows
fields.notes: The slow duration is refreshed on successive casts.

fields.name: Precision Aura

fields.lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.
fields.description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep and deals damage per second.  Sleeping units are awakened when attacked, but the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit.  The nightmared unit instantly wakes up if it takes damage.
fields.name: Nightmare
fields.notes: Nightmare deals damage to allies and himself, so it can be used to deny heroes or himself. Any source of damage except Nightmare will awaken the unit, but only physical attacks cause the Nightmare to be transferred. In the first second of Nightmare, the unit is invulnerable. Bane can wake himself up from Nightmare.

fields.lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.
fields.description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, dealing damage and gaining health equal to the damage dealt.
fields.name: Brain Sap
fields.notes: Bane always receives the full amount of health, regardless of the amount of damage dealt.

fields.lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.
fields.description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, dealing damage and gaining health equal to the damage dealt.
fields.name: Brain Sap
fields.notes: Bane always receives the full amount of health, regardless of the amount of damage dealt.

Bane can wake himself up from Nightmare.

fields.lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every second based on the unit's maximum mana.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Fiend's Grip
fields.notes: Fiend's Grip will disable and drain mana from magic immune units, but not damage them.

fields.lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.

fields.name: Brain Sap
fields.notes: Bane always receives the full amount of health, regardless of the amount of damage dealt.

fields.lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.
fields.description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep and deals damage per second.  Sleeping units are awakened when attacked, but the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit.  The nightmared unit instantly wakes up if it takes damage.
fields.name: Nightmare
fields.notes: Nightmare deals damage to allies and himself, so it can be used to deny heroes or himself. Any source of damage except Nightmare will awaken the unit, but only physical attacks cause the Nightmare to be transferred. In the first second of Nightmare, the unit is invulnerable. Bane can wake himself up from Nightmare.

fields.lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.
fields.description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, dealing damage and gaining health equal to the damage dealt.
fields.name: Brain Sap
fields.notes: Bane always receives the full amount of health, regardless of the amount of damage dealt.

fields.lore: Even the mightiest of warriors crumble before the terror of Atropos.
fields.description: Weakens an enemy unit, reducing its physical damage.  Lasts 20 seconds.
fields.name: Enfeeble
fields.notes: Enfeeble cannot be purged.

fields.lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every second based on the unit's maximum mana.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Fiend's Grip
fields.notes: Fiend's Grip will disable and drain mana from magic immune units, but not damage them.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
fields.description: Summons a Healing Ward that heals all nearby allied units, based on their max hit points.  The Healing Ward can move at 450 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
fields.name: Healing Ward
fields.notes: The healing ward can be controlled. Multiple healing wards don't stack.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
fields.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 175-250 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Omnislash
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target. Can target magic immune units. Slashes happen on an interval of 0.4 seconds. Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash. You can use items during Omnislash.

fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: Akasha's envenomed dagger allows her to delight in the drawn out suffering of her victims.
fields.description: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15 seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.
fields.name: Shadow Strike
fields.notes: The affected unit slowly regains its original movement speed every second during the duration. Units afflicted by Shadow Strike can be denied by their allies when their HP drops below 25%% of their maximum health.

fields.lore: The Secret Queen lives up to her title, making her pain impossible to escape.
fields.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.
fields.name: Blink
fields.notes: If you used Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead. You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.

fields.lore: The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.
fields.description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
fields.name: Scream Of Pain
fields.notes: Scream Of Pain will hit invisible units. Scream Of Pain cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.
fields.description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
fields.name: Scream Of Pain
fields.notes: Scream Of Pain will hit invisible units. Scream Of Pain cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.
fields.description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
fields.name: Scream Of Pain
fields.notes: Scream Of Pain will hit invisible units. Scream Of Pain cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: Her most exquisite of all of torments, Akasha's Sonic Wave puts her poor foes out of their misery.
fields.description:
Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Sonic Wave
fields.notes: Sonic Wave can hit units up to 1200 units away.

fields.lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
fields.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.
fields.name: Storm Hammer

fields.lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.
fields.description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
fields.name: Great Cleave
fields.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. The cleave damages a circular area in front of Sven.

fields.lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!
fields.description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 7 seconds.
fields.name: Warcry
fields.notes: Fully stacks with other armor and speed granting abilities.

fields.lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.
fields.description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
fields.name: Great Cleave
fields.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. The cleave damages a circular area in front of Sven.

fields.lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.
fields.description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
fields.name: Great Cleave
fields.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. The cleave damages a circular area in front of Sven.

fields.lore: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.
fields.description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 25 seconds.
fields.name: God's Strength
fields.notes: The bonus damage is based on base damage and the primary attribute of Sven.
