fields.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
fields.description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.
fields.name: Counter Helix
fields.notes: Counter Helix checks for triggering whenever an attack against Axe begins, not when Axe is actually damaged by said attack.

fields.lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.
fields.description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
fields.name: Berserker's Call
fields.notes: Affects units with magic immunity.

fields.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
fields.description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.
fields.name: Counter Helix
fields.notes: Counter Helix checks for triggering whenever an attack against Axe begins, not when Axe is actually damaged by said attack.

fields.lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
fields.description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.
fields.name: Battle Hunger
fields.notes: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff. Units affected by Battle Hunger cannot be denied.

fields.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
fields.description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.
fields.name: Counter Helix
fields.notes: Counter Helix checks for triggering whenever an attack against Axe begins, not when Axe is actually damaged by said attack.

fields.lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.
fields.description:
Axe spots weakness and strikes, dealing moderate damage but instantly killing an enemy unit with low health.  When an enemy hero is killed in this way, the cooldown is reset. Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Culling Blade
fields.notes: The killing blow goes through magic immunity.

fields.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
fields.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
fields.name: Crystal Nova

fields.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.
fields.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
fields.name: Nether Blast
fields.notes: Damage is delayed by 0.9 seconds.

fields.lore: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.
fields.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
fields.name: Nether Blast
fields.notes: Damage is delayed by 0.9 seconds.

fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.
fields.description:
Dragon Knight can take the form of three powerful elder dragons.
LEVEL 1 - Green Dragon: Short poison damage over time on attack.
LEVEL 2 - Red Dragon: Splash damage on attack.
LEVEL 3 - Blue Dragon: Splash damage and frost attack that slows enemy units.
fields.name: Elder Dragon Form
fields.notes: Level 1 Dragon's Corrosive Breath deals 20 damage per second and lasts 5 seconds, and works on structures. Level 2 Dragon's Splash Attack deals 100/75/50% in a 100/200/250 radius, and has level 1's Corrosive Breath. Level 3 Dragon's Frost Breath slows movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20%, lasting 3 seconds.

fields.lore: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.
fields.description:
Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

Fury Swipes is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Fury Swipes

fields.lore: Armageddon rides between the planes, bringing Chaos Knight to his victim wherever he may hide.
fields.description: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a random point along the line between the two of you. Gives you bonus attack damage for one attack.
fields.name: Reality Rift
fields.notes: Chaos Knight and the target unit are made to face each other, and Chaos Knight and his illusions are issued an attack order against the target.

fields.lore: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.
fields.description:
Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

Fury Swipes is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Fury Swipes

fields.lore: Chaos Knight's unwieldy power bludgeons those who stand before him, crushing the thickest of armors.
fields.description: Chaos Knight's mojo gives him a chance to deal bonus damage.
fields.name: Chaos Strike

fields.lore: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.
fields.description:
Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

Fury Swipes is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Fury Swipes

fields.lore: Drawing on his battles fought across many worlds and many times, phantasms of the Chaos Knight rise up to quell all who oppose him.
fields.description: Summons several copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The illusions deal full damage, but take double damage.
fields.name: Phantasm
fields.notes: Removes most negative buffs from Chaos Knight. Chaos Knight is invulnerable for 0.5 seconds when casting, allowing him to dodge stuns and damage.

fields.lore: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.
fields.description:
Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

Fury Swipes is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Fury Swipes

fields.lore: Chaos Knight's unwieldy power bludgeons those who stand before him, crushing the thickest of armors.
fields.description: Chaos Knight's mojo gives him a chance to deal bonus damage.
fields.name: Chaos Strike

fields.lore: Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.
fields.description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
fields.name: Chaos Bolt

fields.lore: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.
fields.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.
fields.name: Dragon Tail

fields.lore: Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.
fields.description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
fields.name: Chaos Bolt

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.
fields.description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
fields.name: Chaos Bolt

fields.lore: Pugna has truly become more powerful than even the grandmaster of Oblivion.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - While channelling Life Drain, Pugna siphons HP of the target enemy unit. If you are full HP, it will restore mana instead. Lasts 10 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Life Drain
fields.notes: HP drained depends on the actual damage dealt. Illusions are destroyed on the first tick of damage.

fields.lore: Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.
fields.description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
fields.name: Chaos Bolt

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: While at the lamasery for the Arts of Oblivion, Pugna learned to dominate his classmates with a simple ward charged with Nether magic.
fields.description: Pugna places a nether ward that fires mana flares at enemy heroes who dare to cast spells, while also preventing them from regenerating mana.  Nether Ward deals damage equal to the damage multiplier times the mana spent by the enemy hero.  Lasts 25 seconds.
fields.name: Nether Ward
fields.notes: Nether Ward deals damage before the actual spell is cast, so if the caster dies the spell will have no effect. Nether Ward can be decrepified. Nether Ward has 3 HP. Heroes can attack it for 1 damage, while non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.

fields.lore: While at the lamasery for the Arts of Oblivion, Pugna learned to dominate his classmates with a simple ward charged with Nether magic.

fields.lore: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.
fields.description:
Summons 10 serpent wards to attack enemy units and structures. The wards are immune to magic, and have a small area of splash damage that increases per level.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Mass Serpent Ward
fields.notes: Serpent Wards deal piercing type splash damage. Serpent Wards deal 100% damage in a 50/75/85 radius. Serpent Wards deal 40% damage in a 75/100/110 radius. Serpent Wards deal 20% damage in a 150/200/220 radius.

fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.
fields.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
fields.name: Dragon Blood

fields.lore: A slam of Mangix' mighty keg starts the festivities.
fields.description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy land units.
fields.name: Thunder Clap

fields.lore: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.
fields.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
fields.name: Dragon Blood

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.
fields.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
fields.name: Dragon Blood

fields.lore: Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.
fields.description: Ursa goes into a frenzy, gaining a percentage of his current health as bonus damage. Lasts 15 seconds.
fields.name: Enrage

fields.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four..
fields.description: Phantom Lancer's attacks have a chance to create illusions to confuse enemies.  Phantom Lancer himself counts as one towards the max images.
fields.name: Juxtapose

fields.lore: When Mangix won his title as the Brewmaster of the Order of Oyo, he also claimed his place in the mastery of inebriation.
fields.description: Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage.
fields.name: Drunken Brawler
fields.notes: Does not stack with evasion from other sources.

fields.lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to blend with all spectrums of light.
fields.description: Renders Phantom Lancer invisible, while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies.
fields.name: Doppelwalk

fields.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four..
fields.description: Phantom Lancer's attacks have a chance to create illusions to confuse enemies.  Phantom Lancer himself counts as one towards the max images.
fields.name: Juxtapose

fields.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four..
fields.description: Phantom Lancer's attacks have a chance to create illusions to confuse enemies.  Phantom Lancer himself counts as one towards the max images.
fields.name: Juxtapose

fields.lore: Azwraith accepts his fate, embracing his infinite army of phantoms.
fields.description: Phantom Lancer hones his abilities.  Improves chance of Juxtaposing, and the Juxtapose illusions can now create their own illusions.  Phantom Edge also increases Phantom Lancer's magic resistance.
fields.name: Phantom Edge
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four..
fields.description: Phantom Lancer's attacks have a chance to create illusions to confuse enemies.  Phantom Lancer himself counts as one towards the max images.
fields.name: Juxtapose

fields.description: Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage.
fields.name: Drunken Brawler
fields.notes: Does not stack with evasion from other sources.

fields.name: Drunken Brawler
fields.notes: Does not stack with evasion from other sources.

fields.description: Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage.
fields.name: Drunken Brawler
fields.notes: Does not stack with evasion from other sources.

fields.lore: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.
fields.name: Shadow Walk
fields.notes: Will not break most channeling of spells upon activation. The bonus damage is a separate instance, and isn't considered in Jinada's calculation.

fields.lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
fields.description: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.
fields.name: Breathe Fire
fields.notes: Affects mechanical units. Hits units up to 900 away.

fields.lore: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.
fields.name: Shadow Walk
fields.notes: Will not break most channeling of spells upon activation. The bonus damage is a separate instance, and isn't considered in Jinada's calculation.

fields.description: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.
fields.name: Breathe Fire
fields.notes: Affects mechanical units. Hits units up to 900 away.

fields.lore: Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.
fields.description: Tracks an enemy hero, giving True Sight of it and grants a gain in movement speed to allies near the hunted. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bounty in gold.
fields.name: Track
fields.notes: Bounty Hunter will get the bonus gold if the target dies while Track is active, regardless of how it died. Gives True Sight as well as shared vision of the target. Track's effect is only visible to allies. The allies that are receiving the bonus speed from Track are the ones that will receive the bonus gold. Bonus gold is reliable gold.

fields.description: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.
fields.name: Breathe Fire
fields.notes: Affects mechanical units. Hits units up to 900 away.

fields.name: Shadow Walk
fields.notes: Will not break most channeling of spells upon activation. The bonus damage is a separate instance, and isn't considered in Jinada's calculation.

fields.lore: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.
fields.description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.
fields.name: Overpower
fields.notes: Overpower grants maximum increased attack speed. Overpower isn't removed by Black King Bar.

fields.lore: Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.
fields.description: Tracks an enemy hero, giving True Sight of it and grants a gain in movement speed to allies near the hunted. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bounty in gold.
fields.name: Track
fields.notes: Bounty Hunter will get the bonus gold if the target dies while Track is active, regardless of how it died. Gives True Sight as well as shared vision of the target. Track's effect is only visible to allies. The allies that are receiving the bonus speed from Track are the ones that will receive the bonus gold. Bonus gold is reliable gold.

fields.lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
fields.name: Jinada

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: Bradwarden has no need to parry his opponent's attacks; his armor-like hide does it for him.
fields.description: Centaur immediately counters every attack, damaging the attacker based on a percentage of Centaur's strength.
fields.name: Return
fields.notes: Return's effect begins when the attack begins an attack, not when the attack is completed. Return deals damage to towers.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
fields.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 175-250 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Omnislash
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target. Can target magic immune units. Slashes happen on an interval of 0.4 seconds. Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash. You can use items during Omnislash.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
fields.name: Jinada

fields.lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
fields.name: Jinada

fields.lore: When the mighty hoof of the Warrunner touches soil, the tremors are felt far and wide.
fields.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.
fields.name: Hoof Stomp

fields.lore: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.
fields.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.
fields.name: Hex
fields.notes: Instantly destroys illusions. The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled. Hex disables damage block and evasion.

fields.lore: A now-mastered relic from his childhood, Pugna delights in banishing others into the Nether Realm, whether for good, evil, or simple enjoyment.
fields.description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage.
fields.name: Decrepify
fields.notes: Only magical and pure damage can affect a unit under the effects of Decrepify.

fields.lore: When the mighty hoof of the Warrunner touches soil, the tremors are felt far and wide.
fields.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.
fields.name: Hoof Stomp

fields.lore: When the mighty hoof of the Warrunner touches soil, the tremors are felt far and wide.
fields.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.
fields.name: Hoof Stomp

fields.lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.
fields.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.
fields.name: Frost Blast

fields.lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.
fields.description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.
fields.name: Shackles

fields.lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.
fields.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.
fields.name: Frost Blast

fields.lore: Sylla's lifelong companion is symbiotic with his spirit and heart, coming to aid him in any time of need.
fields.description: Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items.  If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack.  If the Spirit Bear dies, the Lone Druid suffers composite damage as backlash.  As the bear increases in levels, it can learn the Return, Entangling Claws, and Demolish abilities.  Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.
fields.name: Summon Spirit Bear
fields.notes: Most spells interact with the Spirit Bear in the same way as they do with heroes. You can't resummon the bear if it has taken damage in the past 3 seconds.

fields.lore: Sylla studies and masters the arts of the lost Bear Clan, enhancing his attunement with the wild.
fields.description: Increases the Lone Druid's synergy with his Spirit Bear and himself, upgrading attributes and abilities.
fields.name: Synergy

fields.lore: Sylla's lifelong companion is symbiotic with his spirit and heart, coming to aid him in any time of need.

fields.lore: Bears are not commonly seen as being agile creatures, but can actually move rather quickly, especially when enraged.
fields.description: Increases the attack and movement speed of Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear.
fields.name: Rabid

fields.name: Rabid

fields.lore: The mighty bear is the king of the forest, possessing the throne through raw power.
fields.description: Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage and some base movement speed, but gaining melee power as well as the Battle Cry ability.  He can morph freely between druid and bear form.
fields.name: True Form
fields.notes: You can dodge stuns during the 2 second duration of transforming.

fields.name: Rabid

fields.description: Return to Druid form.
fields.name: Druid Form

fields.name: Healing Ward
fields.notes: The healing ward can be controlled. Multiple healing wards don't stack.

fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
fields.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 175-250 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Omnislash
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target. Can target magic immune units. Slashes happen on an interval of 0.4 seconds. Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash. You can use items during Omnislash.

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
fields.description: Summons a Healing Ward that heals all nearby allied units, based on their max hit points.  The Healing Ward can move at 450 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
fields.name: Healing Ward
fields.notes: The healing ward can be controlled. Multiple healing wards don't stack.

fields.description: Allows manipulation of ice elements and grants a permanent strength bonus. Each Quas instance provides increased health regeneration.
fields.name: Quas
fields.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

fields.lore: So begins a new age of knowledge.
fields.description:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated, creating a new spell at the Invoker's disposal. Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Invoke
fields.notes: The arrangement of instances does not matter.

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to blend with all spectrums of light.
fields.description: Renders Phantom Lancer invisible, while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies.
fields.name: Doppelwalk

fields.name: Doppelwalk

fields.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four..
fields.description: Phantom Lancer's attacks have a chance to create illusions to confuse enemies.  Phantom Lancer himself counts as one towards the max images.
fields.name: Juxtapose

fields.lore: Azwraith accepts his fate, embracing his infinite army of phantoms.
fields.description: Phantom Lancer hones his abilities.  Improves chance of Juxtaposing, and the Juxtapose illusions can now create their own illusions.  Phantom Edge also increases Phantom Lancer's magic resistance.
fields.name: Phantom Edge
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.
fields.description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.
fields.name: Shackles

fields.lore: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.
fields.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.
fields.name: Hex
fields.notes: Instantly destroys illusions. The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled. Hex disables damage block and evasion.

fields.lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.
fields.description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.
fields.name: Shackles

fields.lore: Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.
fields.description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
fields.name: Ether Shock
fields.notes: Can hit secondary targets up to 1000 distance away.

fields.lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.
fields.description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.
fields.name: Shackles

fields.lore: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.
fields.description:
Summons 10 serpent wards to attack enemy units and structures. The wards are immune to magic, and have a small area of splash damage that increases per level.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Mass Serpent Ward
fields.notes: Serpent Wards deal piercing type splash damage. Serpent Wards deal 100% damage in a 50/75/85 radius. Serpent Wards deal 40% damage in a 75/100/110 radius. Serpent Wards deal 20% damage in a 150/200/220 radius.

fields.name: Ether Shock

fields.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
fields.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, fissuring the earth while stunning and damaging enemy units in a line.  Creates an impassable ridge of stone.
fields.name: Fissure

fields.lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
fields.description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.
fields.name: Enchant Totem
fields.notes: Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.

fields.lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
fields.description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
fields.name: Aftershock
fields.notes: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.

fields.lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
fields.description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.
fields.name: Enchant Totem
fields.notes: Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.

fields.lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
fields.description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
fields.name: Aftershock
fields.notes: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.

fields.lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.
fields.description:
Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Echo Slam
fields.notes: Will not damage ethereal units. The initial damage will go through magic immunity; the additional damage will not. Units creating echoes also take damage from the wave they produced.

fields.lore: A true steward of the forest, Aiushtha befriends all within it - from lowly trolls to powerful centaurs.
fields.description: Enchantress charms an enemy, bringing it under her control (if a creep) or slowing it (if a hero).
fields.name: Enchant
fields.notes: Illusions can be converted.

fields.lore: After attacking Aiushtha, most opponents are overwhelmed with guilt having attacked such a natural beauty.
fields.description: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.  Lasts 3 seconds.
fields.name: Untouchable
fields.notes: All units who directly attack or cast spells on Enchantress will get slowed. The slow is applied on the attacking unit when the attack starts, not when damage is applied.

fields.lore: Whimsical spirits of the woods possess a healing power that is quite subtle, but gains strength in numbers.
fields.description: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby.  Lasts 10 seconds.
fields.name: Nature's Attendants
fields.notes: Units with full HP will not be seleted for the heal. Can heal units with magic immunity.

fields.lore: After attacking Aiushtha, most opponents are overwhelmed with guilt having attacked such a natural beauty.
fields.description: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.  Lasts 3 seconds.
fields.name: Untouchable
fields.notes: All units who directly attack or cast spells on Enchantress will get slowed. The slow is applied on the attacking unit when the attack starts, not when damage is applied.

fields.lore: After attacking Aiushtha, most opponents are overwhelmed with guilt having attacked such a natural beauty.
fields.description: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.  Lasts 3 seconds.
fields.name: Untouchable
fields.notes: All units who directly attack or cast spells on Enchantress will get slowed. The slow is applied on the attacking unit when the attack starts, not when damage is applied.

fields.lore: While Aiushtha favors peaceful means, she is capable of a magical onslaught from a distance, her spears gaining energy from the natural life around her.
fields.description:
Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt.

Impetus is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Impetus
fields.notes: The damage is capped at 2500 distance. Distance to target is measured when the projectile hits.

fields.lore: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.
fields.description: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.
fields.name: Blink Strike
fields.notes: Riki's first attack after Blink Strike will be a backstab. Blink Strike's damage is dealt before the next attack. You can Blink Strike to allies, but no damage is dealt.

fields.lore: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.
fields.description: If Riki attacks from behind, bonus damage is applied based on his current agility.
fields.name: Backstab
fields.notes: Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage. Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.

fields.lore: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.
fields.description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing and slowing enemy units in an area while causing them to miss on most attacks.  Lasts 6 seconds.
fields.name: Smoke Screen
fields.notes: Doesn't prevent the use of active items.

fields.lore: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.
fields.description: If Riki attacks from behind, bonus damage is applied based on his current agility.
fields.name: Backstab
fields.notes: Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage. Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.

fields.lore: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.

fields.name: Backstab
fields.notes: Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage. Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.

fields.lore: Riki comes for you.
fields.description: Riki fades into the shadows, staying permanently invisible except while attacking.  While silenced, Riki will be visible.
fields.name: Permanent Invisibility
fields.notes: Riki won't auto attack enemies while invisible. Silence disables this ability.

fields.name: Permanent Invisibility
fields.notes: Riki won't auto attack enemies while invisible. Silence disables this ability.

fields.lore: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.
fields.description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing and slowing enemy units in an area while causing them to miss on most attacks.  Lasts 6 seconds.
fields.name: Smoke Screen
fields.notes: Doesn't prevent the use of active items.

fields.lore: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.
fields.description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing and slowing enemy units in an area while causing them to miss on most attacks.  Lasts 6 seconds.
fields.name: Smoke Screen
fields.notes: Doesn't prevent the use of active items.

fields.lore: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.
fields.description: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.
fields.name: Blink Strike
fields.notes: Riki's first attack after Blink Strike will be a backstab. Blink Strike's damage is dealt before the next attack. You can Blink Strike to allies, but no damage is dealt.

fields.lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.
fields.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
fields.name: Rot
fields.notes: Using Rot doesn't interrupt channeling. Rot hits invisible units. If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated. Pudge can deny himself with this ability.

fields.lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.
fields.description: Launches a bloody hook at a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.
fields.name: Meat Hook
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy. Meat Hook hits invisible units. Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, and mechanical units. Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.

fields.lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Dismember
fields.notes: Dismember will disable magic immune units, but not damage them. If a unit becomes invisible while Dismembered, it will still be under the effects of Dismember.

fields.name: Rot
fields.notes: Using Rot doesn't interrupt channeling. Rot hits invisible units. If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated. Pudge can deny himself with this ability.

fields.lore: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'
fields.description: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
fields.name: Flesh Heap
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.
fields.description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around you. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
fields.name: Fire Spirits

fields.lore: Though no stranger to travelling the cosmic void, soaring within an atmosphere offers unique pleasures.
fields.description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units he comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to his original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.
fields.name: Icarus Dive
fields.notes: Icarus Dive has a 2 second travel duration, and can be cancelled by casting the ability again while in flight.

fields.lore: The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.
fields.description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around you. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
fields.name: Fire Spirits

fields.lore: The vent through which such stellar energy flows is mere atoms wide.
fields.description: Drawing from his own inner fire, Phoenix expels a huge beam of light at the cost of his own life energy. The beam damages enemies for a percentage of their life and heals allies for half the amount. Damage scales up to twice the initial damage as the beam fires.
fields.name: Sun Ray

fields.lore: The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.
fields.description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around you. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
fields.name: Fire Spirits

fields.lore: The solar crucible of a Supernova may be fatal, yet from its flames arise new beacons to wander infinity.
fields.description: The Phoenix willingly ends his current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area.
fields.name: Supernova

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four..
fields.description: Phantom Lancer's attacks have a chance to create illusions to confuse enemies.  Phantom Lancer himself counts as one towards the max images.
fields.name: Juxtapose

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to blend with all spectrums of light.
fields.description: Renders Phantom Lancer invisible, while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies.
fields.name: Doppelwalk

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Azwraith accepts his fate, embracing his infinite army of phantoms.
fields.description: Phantom Lancer hones his abilities.  Improves chance of Juxtaposing, and the Juxtapose illusions can now create their own illusions.  Phantom Edge also increases Phantom Lancer's magic resistance.
fields.name: Phantom Edge
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.
fields.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
fields.name: Unstable Concoction
fields.notes: Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing. A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. Maximum effects are achieved after 5 seconds. You can deny yourself with this skill. Unstable Concoction cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.
fields.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take mixed damage per second and have their armor reduced.
fields.name: Acid Spray
fields.notes: Hits magic immune units.

fields.lore: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.
fields.description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.
fields.name: Chemical Rage
fields.notes: Has a 0.35 second transformation time, which can be used to dodge projectiles and stuns.

fields.lore: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.
fields.description: Alchemist gets bonus gold for killing creeps; the bonus stacks if the creeps are killed within a period of time, after which the count is reset.  The bonus gold is capped at 30 gold.
fields.name: Greevil's Greed

fields.lore: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.

fields.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
fields.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, fissuring the earth while stunning and damaging enemy units in a line.  Creates an impassable ridge of stone.
fields.name: Fissure

fields.lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
fields.description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
fields.name: Aftershock
fields.notes: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.

fields.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
fields.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, fissuring the earth while stunning and damaging enemy units in a line.  Creates an impassable ridge of stone.
fields.name: Fissure

fields.lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
fields.description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.
fields.name: Enchant Totem
fields.notes: Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.

fields.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
fields.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, fissuring the earth while stunning and damaging enemy units in a line.  Creates an impassable ridge of stone.
fields.name: Fissure

fields.lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.
fields.description:
Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Echo Slam
fields.notes: Will not damage ethereal units. The initial damage will go through magic immunity; the additional damage will not. Units creating echoes also take damage from the wave they produced.

fields.lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
fields.description: Fires an arrow with deadly precision, dealing large damage and stunning the first enemy unit it strikes. Stun duration increases based on distance to target, ranging from 0.5 to 5 seconds. Bonus damage up to 100 is applied based on distance to target.
fields.name: Sacred Arrow
fields.notes: For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds. Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.

fields.lore: Both friend and foe alike recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.
fields.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 10 seconds.
fields.name: Leap
fields.notes: You can use Leap to dodge incoming projectiles.

fields.lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
fields.description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. One random enemy unit in 175 range will take a second hit for 75% of the damage.
fields.name: Starstorm
fields.notes: Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere. Starstorm cannot hit invisible units. Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.

fields.lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
fields.description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If Invisibility is broken, it will restore after fade delay if the shadow's duration has not expired.  Silence will stop Moonlight Shadow.
fields.name: Moonlight Shadow
fields.notes: Units affected will not auto attack enemies. Magic immune allies will be affected.

fields.name: Leap
fields.notes: You can use Leap to dodge incoming projectiles.

fields.lore: Both friend and foe alike recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.
fields.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 10 seconds.
fields.name: Leap
fields.notes: You can use Leap to dodge incoming projectiles.

fields.lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
fields.description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If Invisibility is broken, it will restore after fade delay if the shadow's duration has not expired.  Silence will stop Moonlight Shadow.
fields.name: Moonlight Shadow
fields.notes: Units affected will not auto attack enemies. Magic immune allies will be affected.

fields.lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
fields.description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If Invisibility is broken, it will restore after fade delay if the shadow's duration has not expired.  Silence will stop Moonlight Shadow.
fields.name: Moonlight Shadow
fields.notes: Units affected will not auto attack enemies. Magic immune allies will be affected.

fields.lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
fields.description: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.
fields.name: Breathe Fire
fields.notes: Affects mechanical units. Hits units up to 900 away.

fields.lore: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.
fields.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
fields.name: Dragon Blood

fields.lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
fields.description: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.
fields.name: Breathe Fire
fields.notes: Affects mechanical units. Hits units up to 900 away.

fields.lore: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.
fields.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.
fields.name: Dragon Tail

fields.lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
fields.description: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.
fields.name: Breathe Fire
fields.notes: Affects mechanical units. Hits units up to 900 away.

fields.lore: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.
fields.description:
Dragon Knight can take the form of three powerful elder dragons.
LEVEL 1 - Green Dragon: Short poison damage over time on attack.
LEVEL 2 - Red Dragon: Splash damage on attack.
LEVEL 3 - Blue Dragon: Splash damage and frost attack that slows enemy units.
fields.name: Elder Dragon Form
fields.notes: Level 1 Dragon's Corrosive Breath deals 20 damage per second and lasts 5 seconds, and works on structures. Level 2 Dragon's Splash Attack deals 100/75/50% in a 100/200/250 radius, and has level 1's Corrosive Breath. Level 3 Dragon's Frost Breath slows movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20%, lasting 3 seconds.

fields.lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.
fields.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.
fields.name: Time Lock
fields.notes: Stun works on magic immune units. Does not stack with Skull Basher. Deals twice as much damage if the unit is in Chronosphere.

fields.lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.
fields.description: Rushes to a target location while slowing the movement and attack speed of all enemies along its path for 3 seconds.
fields.name: Time Walk
fields.notes: Faceless Void is invulnerable while using Time Walk.

fields.lore: Darkterror sees what has yet to be seen.
fields.description: Faceless Void dodges damage by jumping backward in time, eluding both physical and magical attacks.
fields.name: Backtrack
fields.notes: Stacks with evasion. Abilities that grant True Strike don't work against Backtrack.

fields.lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.
fields.description: Rushes to a target location while slowing the movement and attack speed of all enemies along its path for 3 seconds.
fields.name: Time Walk
fields.notes: Faceless Void is invulnerable while using Time Walk.

fields.lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.
fields.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.
fields.name: Time Lock
fields.notes: Stun works on magic immune units. Does not stack with Skull Basher. Deals twice as much damage if the unit is in Chronosphere.

fields.lore: When a rift opens to Claszureme, all poor souls caught within will likely never return.
fields.description:
Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Chronosphere
fields.notes: Pauses all units and buildings, friendly or enemy, except those owned by Faceless Void. Faceless Void is never affected by Chronospheres with any owner. Reveals invisible units.

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
fields.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
fields.name: Crystal Nova

fields.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts 7 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Freezing Field
fields.notes: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts 1 second). Every 0.1 second an explosion occurs, for a total of 70 explosions.

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.

fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: Combining his monk heritage with his newfound affinity for plague has a menacing result.
fields.description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
fields.name: Death Pulse
fields.notes: Death Pulse can't be disjointed. Can heal magic immune units.

fields.lore: Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.
fields.description: Necrophos gains hp and mana regeneration for every unit he kills. Hero kills grant 10x the regen bonus.
fields.name: Sadist
fields.notes: Sadist is also triggered by denies. Stacks independently with itself.

fields.lore: Combining his monk heritage with his newfound affinity for plague has a menacing result.
fields.description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
fields.name: Death Pulse
fields.notes: Death Pulse can't be disjointed. Can heal magic immune units.

fields.name: Sadist

fields.lore: Combining his monk heritage with his newfound affinity for plague has a menacing result.
fields.description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
fields.name: Death Pulse
fields.notes: Death Pulse can't be disjointed. Can heal magic immune units.

fields.lore: The amount of death and suffering in the air increases the power of Necrophos's plague magic.
fields.description:
Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing.  Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Reaper's Scythe
fields.notes: Damage is dealt at the end of the stun. The stun goes through magic immunity, but not the damage.

fields.lore: Combining his monk heritage with his newfound affinity for plague has a menacing result.
fields.description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
fields.name: Death Pulse
fields.notes: Death Pulse can't be disjointed. Can heal magic immune units.

fields.lore: Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.
fields.description: Necrophos gains hp and mana regeneration for every unit he kills. Hero kills grant 10x the regen bonus.
fields.name: Sadist
fields.notes: Sadist is also triggered by denies. Stacks independently with itself.

fields.lore: Those who come within a short distance of Necrophos can feel pestilence and plague in the air.
fields.description: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.
fields.name: Heartstopper Aura
fields.notes: Damage counts as negative regeneration, and won't disable items like Blink Dagger.

fields.lore: Those who come within a short distance of Necrophos can feel pestilence and plague in the air.

fields.notes: Damage counts as negative regeneration, and won't disable items like Blink Dagger.

fields.notes: Damage is dealt at the end of the stun. The stun goes through magic immunity, but not the damage.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.

fields.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
fields.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 175-250 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Omnislash
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target. Can target magic immune units. Slashes happen on an interval of 0.4 seconds. Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash. You can use items during Omnislash.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.

fields.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
fields.description: Summons a Healing Ward that heals all nearby allied units, based on their max hit points.  The Healing Ward can move at 450 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
fields.name: Healing Ward
fields.notes: The healing ward can be controlled. Multiple healing wards don't stack.

fields.lore: The archers of Stonehall are ready at Tresdin's command.
fields.description: Turns the enemies numbers against them, dealing damage and granting you bonus movement speed per unit.  Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health.
fields.name: Overwhelming Odds

fields.lore: Tresdin knows that an enemy's most vulnerable moment often follows their fiercest stroke.
fields.description: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately attack again with bonus lifesteal.
fields.name: Moment of Courage

fields.lore: The archers of Stonehall are ready at Tresdin's command.
fields.description: Turns the enemies numbers against them, dealing damage and granting you bonus movement speed per unit.  Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health.
fields.name: Overwhelming Odds

fields.lore: The rallying horn of the Bronze Legion is able to inspire any heart.
fields.description: Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus attack speed and health regen for a short time.
fields.name: Press The Attack

fields.lore: The archers of Stonehall are ready at Tresdin's command.
fields.description: Turns the enemies numbers against them, dealing damage and granting you bonus movement speed per unit.  Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health.
fields.name: Overwhelming Odds

fields.lore: To face a soldier of Stonehall in single combat is a challenge few can resist.
fields.description: Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities.  If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.
fields.name: Duel

fields.lore: Although lacking in traditional incantations, Nortrom's pedigree of the Aeol Drias gives him uncanny wisdom, which he applies to physical combat.
fields.description:
Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence. 

Glaives of Wisdom is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Glaives of Wisdom

fields.lore: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.
fields.description: Enchants a target damaging and silencing them if they cast a spell. If the enchantment expires the target will be disarmed in addition to being damaged and silenced.
fields.name: Last Word
fields.notes: Channeling abilities will trigger this affect once the caster finishes its channel.

fields.lore: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.
fields.description: Enchants a target damaging and silencing them if they cast a spell. If the enchantment expires the target will be disarmed in addition to being damaged and silenced.
fields.name: Last Word
fields.notes: Channeling abilities will trigger this affect once the caster finishes its channel.

fields.lore: Nortrom's lack of incantations is less of a problem for him than it is for his adversaries.
fields.description: Curses the target area, causing enemy Heroes to take damage and lose mana until they cast a spell.
fields.name: Curse of the Silent

fields.lore: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.
fields.description: Enchants a target damaging and silencing them if they cast a spell. If the enchantment expires the target will be disarmed in addition to being damaged and silenced.
fields.name: Last Word
fields.notes: Channeling abilities will trigger this affect once the caster finishes its channel.

fields.lore: With a shock to the ground, all magic and sound pauses, and Nortrom fulfills his prophecy.
fields.description:
Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Global Silence
fields.notes: This skill works on invisible and magic immune units, but gaining magic immunity will remove its effect.

fields.lore: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.
fields.description: Enchants a target damaging and silencing them if they cast a spell. If the enchantment expires the target will be disarmed in addition to being damaged and silenced.
fields.name: Last Word
fields.notes: Channeling abilities will trigger this affect once the caster finishes its channel.

fields.lore: Nortrom's lack of incantations is less of a problem for him than it is for his adversaries.
fields.description: Curses the target area, causing enemy Heroes to take damage and lose mana until they cast a spell.
fields.name: Curse of the Silent

fields.lore: Nortrom's lack of incantations is less of a problem for him than it is for his adversaries.
fields.description: Curses the target area, causing enemy Heroes to take damage and lose mana until they cast a spell.
fields.name: Curse of the Silent

fields.lore: Nortrom's lack of incantations is less of a problem for him than it is for his adversaries.
fields.description: Curses the target area, causing enemy Heroes to take damage and lose mana until they cast a spell.
fields.name: Curse of the Silent

fields.lore: With a shock to the ground, all magic and sound pauses, and Nortrom fulfills his prophecy.
fields.description:
Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Global Silence
fields.notes: This skill works on invisible and magic immune units, but gaining magic immunity will remove its effect.

fields.lore: Although lacking in traditional incantations, Nortrom's pedigree of the Aeol Drias gives him uncanny wisdom, which he applies to physical combat.
fields.description:
Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence. 

Glaives of Wisdom is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Glaives of Wisdom

fields.lore: Although lacking in traditional incantations, Nortrom's pedigree of the Aeol Drias gives him uncanny wisdom, which he applies to physical combat.
fields.description:
Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence. 

Glaives of Wisdom is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Glaives of Wisdom

fields.lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.
fields.description: Launches a bloody hook at a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.
fields.name: Meat Hook
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy. Meat Hook hits invisible units. Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, and mechanical units. Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.

fields.lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.
fields.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
fields.name: Rot
fields.notes: Using Rot doesn't interrupt channeling. Rot hits invisible units. If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated. Pudge can deny himself with this ability.

fields.lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.

fields.name: Meat Hook
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy. Meat Hook hits invisible units. Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, and mechanical units. Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.

fields.lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Dismember
fields.notes: Dismember will disable magic immune units, but not damage them. If a unit becomes invisible while Dismembered, it will still be under the effects of Dismember.

fields.lore: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'
fields.description: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
fields.name: Flesh Heap
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.description: Allows manipulation of storm elements and grants a permanent agility bonus. Each Wex instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.
fields.name: Wex
fields.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

fields.description: Allows manipulation of ice elements and grants a permanent strength bonus. Each Quas instance provides increased health regeneration.
fields.name: Quas
fields.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

fields.lore: So begins a new age of knowledge.
fields.description:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated, creating a new spell at the Invoker's disposal. Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Invoke
fields.notes: The arrangement of instances does not matter.

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four..
fields.description: Phantom Lancer's attacks have a chance to create illusions to confuse enemies.  Phantom Lancer himself counts as one towards the max images.
fields.name: Juxtapose

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to blend with all spectrums of light.
fields.description: Renders Phantom Lancer invisible, while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies.
fields.name: Doppelwalk

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Azwraith accepts his fate, embracing his infinite army of phantoms.
fields.description: Phantom Lancer hones his abilities.  Improves chance of Juxtaposing, and the Juxtapose illusions can now create their own illusions.  Phantom Edge also increases Phantom Lancer's magic resistance.
fields.name: Phantom Edge
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.
